77a3(rgyud): nges kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang phran cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud rtsi sde chen pos par snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te/ dung dang / rnga dang / rnga rnga dang / 'khar
77a4(rgyud): dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyises dkrol dang / rnga bo che drung shing tu tra shes bya ba dang /  citse zhes bya ba dang / grangs shig zangs shig/ da cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'dren cing gshol dang / gtun shing dang /

77a6(rgyud): ldan 'das gal ba der song ste skad cig de nyid la a la pa zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog
77a7(rgyud): gdugs kyi sben chen por gyur bar snang // bdun gyi sgra de dag thams cad pa sangs rgyas kyi ste dang / chos kyi sa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang dag par 'phye ba'i spyanams su grag go/ bdud sreg can na gags

77b2(rgyud): bcad pa bzhin du de khyams kyi khyams chen por 'gyem to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos banan pa'i spyan kyis de zhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
77b3(rgyud): thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa gan rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan bzhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam
77b4(rgyud): par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes pa gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di

77b8(rgyud): 'gro ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi sazhar mnyan nag/ rin po ro'i pad+ma da ji'i stan las langs te blags phrag pa gcig tug zer nas
78a1(rgyud): bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su pa

81b1(rgyud): sa sa mngon pa/ bad+mags su skye ga tu su m+b+ha nga / 1dang/ do / rgyam mtshan dang / sngags kyi dang / bad+ma dang / chu seMnas kAr mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'jam phrags
81b2(rgyud): sko sa byas nas nub par gyur to// ma ma pa'i dkyil na 'od zer re ri'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyang na/ chang shing rta'i 'ang 'i tsam pa/ rin po che sna bdun rje rgya las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gas
81b3(rgyud): d+halas byung ba dang / an da rnyib dang / dngum dang / byi du dang / shel dang / ke ke ru dang / dun las kyi chu las byung ba dag 'dor te/ de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las
81b4(rgyud): dab dag go// snying po ni dngul gyi skyalas byung ba'o// khe ba ni byi ru'i rgyu bas byung ba'o// chu ba ni sher gyi thu las byung ba'o// re 'dzu ni ke ke ru rgyu las byung ba'o// man du rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'ang

81b6(rgyud): du rnams kyi 'dab ma ni rtse ng+ge'i rgya las thung ba dag gi/ snying ngo ni shel kyi tshulas byung la khaM ba na~M ke ke ru rgya mas kyang ba'o// Ab nidran pas kyi rgyalas byung ba'o// ji 'bru ni gser gyi rgyulas byung tsa// 
81b7(rgyud): rA les byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'da' ma ni shes kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni ke ke ru myur sa byung ba'o// ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// re 'thun yan dra
81b8(rgyud): rgyal khyung ba'o// shes kyi rgyul pa byung ba'i rnams kyi 'dab ni nag rgyams byung bdag na/ ning nga dun lam gyi lcims byung ba'o//  ba ni gser kyi khyim ma myong ban// rgyu ni yan ma
82a1(rgyud): rgyu las byung ba'o// de 'bru ni dngubagyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ke ke ru'i rgya las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dun las kyi rgya las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni gsar gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// 
82a2(rgyud): ne sand rnyel kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni dngus kyi hu las byung ba'o// je 'brun kyi ru'i thulas byung ba'o// dran pas kye rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni gser kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying pon
82a3(rgyud): la gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// re ba ni dngul gyi rgya las byung ba'o// chub ni bye ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// beng bru ni shes gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i
82a4(rgyud): deni po che'i pad+ma de la langs bcu la reb tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems de'a' sems dpa' chen po kun du mangs pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshigs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs so// 
82a5(rgyud): bsems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od per 'bum 'bum byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mor ra las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
82a6(rgyud): bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang phran gyi rtse mo la seng ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyas mtshan dang / bi den dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i bdan dpyangs pas nam mkha' kun du khobs/ 
82a7(rgyud): / pad+ma dA ga dang / an da rnyil dang / mar gad dang / baidUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / kaM ke ru las byas pa'i gapa chen po'i klad la 'dam bu chu po'i gser gyi shing sa la gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs
82a8(rgyud): bas rnam par spras te/ mdzes par byas pa/ dngul las byas pa'i phug don gyi phreng gi mthar mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dbyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas/ rab tu dga'
82b1(rgyud): gas pa'i sa// don dag bya bang dang / na tso nga/  gas dang / ma bya dag zhes nyams dga' ba khams dang / 'dun yang tshan pa mnyan gar stegs bus bskor bas langs par byas pa/ rin po rnam
82b2(rgyud): las byas pa'i sgo/ khang can/ shes kyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra shis kyi gser gyi bum pa du ma nas spos chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa/ rdzing chen po 'gram gyi ne mun ming mar gad
82b3(rgyud): nga ba/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal 'di dang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur ba dang // lan da ka'i khyu gnas pa/ gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba'i gtos chen po rin
82b4(rgyud): bdun gyi them skas kyis phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i rgyus yongs su gang ba grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor bdag byung ngo // rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i
82b5(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu byung ngo // rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang / be 'dob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sku byung bas lha'i bu mo dag klu len gang byed cing yongs su
82b6(rgyud): ri la snyan dang / pheb rdob pa dang / klu dbyings kyi sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'dil pa 'di dag byung ngo // sbyin dang tshul khrims thos ni gang zhig dpag med cing // de bzhin bzod dang
82b7(rgyud): dag gi stobs ldan la// bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gi sun 'byor pa// ye shes sgrol ma de la skyabs su 'dod par gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan// tha'as dang
82b8(rgyud): chu yan lag deng 'dzin rnams kyis dag/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs 'du ldan pa yi// thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dod bar gyis// 'dam dzab nas ne budu rgyas pa de bzhin du//  de
83a1(rgyud): don mongs 'das kyis tag 'a mi nos pa//  dang skye ba'i sdug pasngas rnam par bsal pa phyeste// rgyal ba 'jig rten 'gon yod la 'akra phyir dag// gcig cad me ldan min par gyu
83a2(rgyud): gang zhig gis// skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug blo glegs rnams bshig cing // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod par bzhi pa// shAkya'i tog ldan del sa su 'dong bar gyis// de ltar khang pabartsegs
83a3(rgyud): dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun du snang ste/ kha cig tu ni rin po che'i sbyin gyi chang 'bab par du du
83a4(rgyud): ngoro// kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni gor shing sha'i can dan dang / spros dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi cher// kha cig tu na gis kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni
83a5(rgyud): reras dang / du ku la'i ras dang / za 'og gi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu nid ka bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog
83a6(rgyud): mdi muka ta kra dang / kA tsa lin da dang / ma hA ka tsa len dadang / btang bzung du btang bzung chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu shwaka chen po dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / sman dA ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char ma

83a8(rgyud): khyab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas che mnong sems dga' bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas la
83b1(rgyud): rngan 'dri ba dag / 'jig rten ci khams mi mdzad de na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'brul sna tshogs ston brkyang ring po nas mthong ngo // de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal
83b2(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa de la phyag bcal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log par snang bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / dad pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log
83b3(rgyud): ltung nga las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga rnams kyi nang du skyes nas par snang 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
83b4(rgyud): rngub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod das lan 'dum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par
83b5(rgyud): 'bras te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams par snang las 'bas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin
83b6(rgyud): tshe gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag na/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / phe ba rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshegs pa
83b7(rgyud): ba 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gang slad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi// ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang // bsod nam
83b8(rgyud): sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog/ byams par mngad pa kye mngomatshar na du byung // bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi// sdig pa'i las gang shin du bskyed pa/ 
84a1(rgyud): sna tshogs pa// de dag thub pa'i bya dwags de ring glo bur du// skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par zhig par gyur// ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang // ji ltar zhugs 'ab
84a2(rgyud): bas ni ras rnams bsreg pa dang // bser mas shing bal ltar lang sprin 'thor ji bzhin du// de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom// bde gshegs sras ngo mthong ngam thos sa
84a3(rgyud): dran gyur na// lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrog pa// 'gro ba yongs kyi sred pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi// thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'// mig dang mgo dang snyed pa

84a5(rgyud): dgas ltogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang // de bzhin skye bo nor 'dod seng dang ldan pa la// thugs/ pyod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' rgyung chog de la sgyu

84b1(rgyud): tshogs gru yis bdag can les gad cig zhes ni dmyal las sum thu'i lga dbang gyur// bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang rgyal sras rnams dang mi// de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu ni chos la// gus 'astod
84b2(rgyud): dge brgya chen de'i dgang thob pa// des gyur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs tho' par nog// de ltar rgyal dang dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas bcom ldan 'das

84b7(rgyud): ba gcig tug par nas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o// rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu bskyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la blta'o// bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyang rogacag tu
84b8(rgyud): ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dran pa'i gzhus 'phangs pa yi shes rab mda' mang gis// ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pa sa mdzad cing /

87a1(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu

92b8(rgyud): ka shA/ shin du grub par byed pa la sgra chen po sa swA / da bu la smra/ don dang mas pa la sna grwa dngas byin gyim rlabs pa sa snahA/ de ga tshig li la swA hA/ ni cig sa she la gsas dpa
93a1(rgyud): cha gas ki la la swA hA/ byis pa gami ga la la swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad ces byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ bdag gi gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad med par mdzod
93a2(rgyud): cig swA hA/ de nas rdo rje khro bo chen pos 'di skad smras pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad dang de bzhin du bar snang la rdo
93a3(rgyud): skar mda' chen po'i be con 'bab bar snang ngo // gnam grub pa'i sgra chen po yang zag go// kun nas sa chen po 'di thum par kun du snang ngo // sa tshan po'i ser ka de dag nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun rkyen du
93a4(rgyud): nga po// chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi chu bzhin dus chen po thams cad kun du gang bar snad do// gang dag pa'i 'ogan gnas pa'i klu chen po dang / lha chen po dang / lham yid chen po dang / de dag pam
93a5(rgyud): dkyang sa'i 'og nas 'thon cing / ri rab kyi drung du 'thon te kun du byung nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas drag shul can drag shul can gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa
93a6(rgyud): 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar zhipa kun du rab tu 'bar te me lde gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun du rnam par 'joms par shes
93a7(rgyud): de dag sdug bsngal mi ba'ad cing drag la rtsub pas zhen nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i du skad 'thon te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyid na
93a8(rgyud): ni mi nyung ba 'dilas yongs su paslar drags ga shegs dang po/ 'dren rnam pa de 'di zhin du dgan 'angag rten gyi khams banan thams cadan gnas pa dang / ri dab cu po dag / steng ga dang / ji dang
93b1(rgyud): da/ shing dga'i 'as pa dag smon parnying pa dang / btung cu dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / gtsug lag lang zheg pa dang / gnas dang /  kha na gnas bdag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan
93b2(rgyud): jigs pa chen por lhung ba 'di las yongs su bsgrub tu gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol gas ched du 'dzad pa ched du brjod do// de bzhin du lha'i khang pa thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos te/ 
93b3(rgyud): pog por gyur cing 'od med par kun du snang ngo // bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun du 'bar/ rab tu lab shing / kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par snang ngo // gang dag bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams ca
93b4(rgyud): gro ba chen pos dngangs skrag ste rang rang gis gad rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAHthung pa dang gas pa
93b5(rgyud): dag po la kan rdo rjel skyabs su dong ngo // dud sdig can yang shin du sdug bsngal pa'i tshor bas nyam tha ga cing skrag la zhum ste gnod pas dngangs nas sang 'argyas la rgyabs su song// chos la skyabs su song/ dge 'dun la
93b6(rgyud): pa ro/ sa kyi bdan pa lagan dang lca pa de grapa da di sa ces smras so// gas byed ga sangasas stsangs dag/ sa pa thobs sheg pa na ru nga cel 'dug
93b7(rgyud): du sangs rgyas la skyabs su bcwa ma// chos la sbubs su 'gro'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro'o// sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir pa lta bu dang / ma lta bu dang / sngun lta bu dang / gnyen lta bu dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams lha
93b8(rgyud): srung bar bya bumams brgyad po da nga phyin pa dasams canapa ma sa dkyipa dang sa dang /  dag gnyen nag ge tan marnams su zu ba byig sas dang /  dang / yid kyi 'azung bdagang byed pa'i
94a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan yang dbugs dpyad ngo // bdag grol nas gzhan yang dgrol lo// bdag mya ngan las
94a2(rgyud): 'das nas gzhan yang bya na las ba/ sa pa dang / rgad dang / khrag dang / sha dang / nyams sa su dang / srog gis kyang sems can thams pad la rim po kyi'o/ chod par bya'o// da par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
94a3(rgyud): dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sgrub dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// bsti stang du bya'o// rim gror bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis dkon mtsho
94a4(rgyud): sum la skabasas 'gro gzung / byang chub kyi sem pa rin pa kyim byed pa dang / thams ca dang ldan pa'i 'dzi da mchor du gyur te/ 'a so nas sran kyang dgacig tu 'di ma pa skyes so//  'i phyi na pa
94a5(rgyud): kod kyis// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir/ khwa med byang chub sems bskyed pa// bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo // rin chen sems 'dis mi ring bar// rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// sems can shin du sdug pa
94a6(rgyud): / shA na las ni bzla bar ces// rgyam pa'i mchog 'di bzhinan/ sgyid su mams cad gdus par byog// stobs ca nga ldan pa yi// dun bani podag gangs par byed/ ded ces smras pa dang / thamam
94a7(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lag gi snyim pa nas me tog gi phur ma thogs par shes te/ me tog gi phram pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yangang
94a8(rgyud): pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang bya ba'i bdag po lagan no rje dang / khro bo chen po dro rje'i khro 'o de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ji'i snying po dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
94b1(rgyud): sa nas 'dus pa 'ini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog gi gzhal med khang chen por gyur to// bdud sden can ni mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur
94b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi ma thu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che'i gabul med/ la na pa dpag bapam gyi shing dus
94b3(rgyud): ga mangs ris brgyad du bris pa/ rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / mar gad dang / bai dUr+ya dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / kaM ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / rdo rje dang
94b4(rgyud): da po dang / dun las dang / dran las chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i tshutshe mi ga zir gyi dra bas rnam par smras pa// gdugs dang / rgyam ma chen dang / bdan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i bdan bsgreng bas legs par brgyan gam
94b5(rgyud): debs klubs pa/ dog sdod du ma nas bdug pa dri zhim tho ba da kyi brinim par byas ga/ phye ma'i drinim pa'i banobs bskos pa/ 'i bu mo 'ibum phrag dum mi la stan dang /  gdob pa dang / klu len cing kar byed ga/ ji
94b6(rgyud): kabargyad dang ldan pa'i ducan 'bum phrag duma'i dbus nas rin ba ci tshogs kyi d+hadapa sun ta dang / bad+ma gar po dang mdus dang / drib cog byung bar mangs par byas ba'i phyog pa dang smar pa byung nag dam tshag ca
94b7(rgyud): dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes te gus pa thams cad kyis da blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rnam par 'phral pa chen po dang / bdud rtsi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyis na sre bo la blangs te/ dge pa'i na
94b8(rgyud): gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dgab pa dang / mchod pa'i phyir yul te/ dul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'didag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byor gyur pa// stobs 'an
95a1(rgyud): sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brten nas su// byang chub phyed ni chags bral dri me byang chub sems/ sems can pade skab gtar dang 'dra ba bdag gis pog/ bdag meg gti mug mun pas dri can dri med gyur// 
95a2(rgyud): srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu gi zhing spros dang bral/ myangangan 'das pa'i drang po'i las ni dag pa bstan/ sems dmyal mi bzang thams cad rab tu ni bar 'gyul// sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la skyabs sum song la/ 
95a3(rgyud): dman pa yun ring ji lta bslus shig gu// de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod napas dang // dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur// sa mdog gcig pur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shod// gcig pus 'gro ba ma
95a4(rgyud): lus mya ngan bzla bar bya/ srid pa gzhan na kun du rgyu che bdag gi yid// rang pan 'jug dang dge ba shes bral bar ma gyur cig/ de nas bdud sdid can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gsang ba pa'i
95a5(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag/ rdo rjes khro ba chen po rdo mam+bu 'o de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang / gdon dang / bgegs
95a6(rgyud): / dadang/ log 'dren de dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad las rnam par rtsom pa la rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / bgegs mi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs
95a7(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chugacig/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa yang byin cig dang / de sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur/ 
95a8(rgyud): ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / khro ba chen po rdo rje khro po de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ga na na rdal legs so zhes te tsheg la mngon par dga' nas yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lham yin dang / 
95b1(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ce dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / ldang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / 
95b2(rgyud): srul po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po mang po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtsho chen

95b4(rgyud): drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed thams cad nyon cig/ khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i

95b8(rgyud): 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas sgra skad kyi de ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung ci stsal pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// deng slan chad
96a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de

96a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni ming dang yi ge dang / sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir na na/ gang mi
96a7(rgyud): / gzugs sam/ dbyibs sam/ gnas sam/ mnyam par gzhag pa'am/ g.yengs pa yang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do// gang la mang med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibasam
96a8(rgyud): dang / gnas med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / g.yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de la ji snyam du sems/ yang btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di
96b1(rgyud): yas cad pas lag gnanamagasas pa shad pas ya/ gnyis gsagasasas byed pas pan/ na ma ga 'ar byed par gtanas pa ma na/ namaganam par byed pa ni gsam par byed pa'i bdag tad kya
96b2(rgyud): bdag ni bdag gis stong/ gnan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong / gnyis ga yang gnyis ka bdag nyid kyib stong ste/ yang dag pam yin pa'i kun du rgyags pa'i phyid do// di mi nas bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig gi dang /

96b5(rgyud): songa'o// glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung yang 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo // de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med
96b6(rgyud): 'o// tshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do// mnor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
96b7(rgyud): nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo // lcug mthong gang yin pa shi gnas so// zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o// 
96b8(rgyud): bar thar pa gang yin pa de dbu ma'i lam yin no// dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de la mtha' gcig med/ mtha' gnyis med/ gsung ba med/ 'dzin pa po med/ 'dzin pa med/ chad pa med// rtag pa med/ skye ba med/ 'gag pa med
97a1(rgyud): rtog pa yang rnam par rtag pa med/ rang dbang mang/ gzhan med bang med/ gro ba mang / 'ong ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byung ba yang / 'du ba med/ 'bral ba med de/ de ni lhag mthong yin no// gas
97a2(rgyud): gang yin pa de la lung po rnams med// khams rnams med/ dbang po rnams med/ skye mched rnams med byal rnams med/ yul du gdags pa med/ las med/ las kyi 'bras bu med do// gang la las med cing las kyis
97a3(rgyud): bu med pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang yin pa de chos so// chos gang yin pa de mi skye mi 'chi'o// mi skye me 'chi ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi khyod kyis
97a5(rgyud): nge 'dzin bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni shin du za ba ste/ 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad pa 'gro ba par med na/ 'jig rten la'i mu stegs can dang / las kyi rgol ba thams cad lta 'aM ts+tsho ci dgos tshe
97a6(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsab pa bskyed pa dang / mos pa chung ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste gzhan du na 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi tshul du gyur pa ni ma gtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs
97a7(rgyud): 'i spyan ni dmigs pa med pa gnas pa med pa'o// de krung ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pa la gdang de rjes ca dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
97a8(rgyud): gshegs pa zhes bya ba der de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshad nyid
97b1(rgyud): ded do// shA gyi bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bugs nyid bzhin gshegs pamatshan nyid med pa yin nad pa'i ltar skyes su chen po'i mtshan stsal rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dang byad
97b2(rgyud): po bcad pas sku legs par brgyan/ ngi lta de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag par ba la/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
97b3(rgyud): par sangs rgyas/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po la gan rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu ma gnyis shes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshig go// brgyan ces bya ba de ni spros pa'i yi ge dang sgra // 
97b4(rgyud): dpe byed bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sgyum dang / rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba don nam mkha'i ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// sdug sum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de tshi
97b5(rgyud): gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do// 
97b6(rgyud): bsod nasas kyi sku mthun pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par 'ongs spyod pa'i blo ste/ 'ad yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bu sbyin las dang gyu gsang bco// btsun pa shAng bti sa gsung
97b7(rgyud): ba dang na dang pa gnyis kyi ca myed / na dza'i na dpa pa nyis kyi da gang yin pa de bzhin pashenas pa'i sngal pa'i /  'brel bar 'byung brgyad pa ma
97b8(rgyud): pa dang / rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugs su rud pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa/ bsam gtan goms par bya bar shes par bye ba ste/ dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med// 
98a1(rgyud): ba dang / rnam par byang bas stong ba/ lus kyi yul ma yin pa/ ngag gi spyod yul ma len pa/ yid kyi rang gi tsa'i yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi snyunapa
98a2(rgyud): pa'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa de ltar blta bar bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i'e bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang 'gang
98a3(rgyud): de ni chos kyi sku'o// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu mi'i lam du blta'o// dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de ni mi sre mi 'chi ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyung yang rung / ma byung yang
98a4(rgyud): chos kyi sku 'di ni gnas pa nyid do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba de ni pha rol tu phyin pa dag gi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de yang bso
98a5(rgyud): rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi nang gi dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongs su btang bar bya'o// de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni
98a6(rgyud): rdzob kyi tshig go// nang zhes bya ba de ni don dam pa'i tshig// de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams ya bas dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la sgrom dang / de bzhin du bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed dad
98a7(rgyud): go shas 'tsho ba dang / glang po ni dang / ta dang / shing d+ha dang / sa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / nang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/ de yang thabs kyi
98a8(rgyud): rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas yongs su bsngos pa rnam par smin pa la mi ra ba dang / gya nom pa dang / rgya che ba dang / rang gi bsti stang du byas te rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin pa 'di ni
98b1(rgyud): 'o// nang gi ni chos sbyin pa'o// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rten cing 'bral par 'byung ba la 'jug par yang dag par gzhal ba dang / sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / bzod pa'i gtam dang / brtson 'gru
98b2(rgyud): dang / brasam gtan dang / shes pa dang / babs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi gtam dang / snying nges yongs su rin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba'o// gzhan yang nang ni sbyin
98b3(rgyud): 'di mthar 'dzin pa dang / skye ba dang / 'gag par yongs su rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnam par spangs pa dga' bas yongs su zin pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'du
98b4(rgyud): ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o// gang 'di nyid la lus dang / ngag dang / yid rgod pa med pa dang // kheng sa pa med pa dang / lus rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / ngag rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / yid rnam par g.yeng ba med par
98b5(rgyud): ga ba pho phyin pas yongs sa zin pa/ gcig tu non mongs pa med par gnas pa/ btang stoms kyis yongs su zin pa/ rabs kyi pha rim tu phyin pa yang dag pa 'du ba 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
98b6(rgyud): gang 'di nyid la rang gi lus dang srog pa mi lta bar bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa dang / bden pa dang / mden pa ma yin pa dang / g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnam
98b7(rgyud): par spong zhing byabs pas yongs su zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dug 'di ni 'dir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tho bang
98b8(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir sems ston rtsom pa dang / yongs su mi kyo bar rtag tu gnas pa med pa dang / de dmigs pa med pa dang / byam sapas yongs su zin pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'dzin di
99a1(rgyud): / bcan 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni bsad nams kyi tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub par byed pa
99a2(rgyud): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag nyid rtogs pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'byed pa dang / 'grel pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / 
99a3(rgyud): zhing mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / gso ba dang / gsog dang / dngos po med pa dang / dngos po thams cad dngos po med par yang dag par ston to// mdor bsdu na 'dod chags da
99a4(rgyud): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyan mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cid chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mtha' las skye mched dang mnyam par yang dag par ston te/ dmigs pa bral ba 'dri ni 'dir bas
99a5(rgyud): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir shes
99a6(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs so// bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / shes par
99a7(rgyud): shes bya mtha' dag dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dag gi mdor bsdus te
99a8(rgyud): pa'o// rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis klu che'i ched bapral bar bzhugs te bstan cir bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// sku'i gsang ba 'i lta 'a bshin du gsu shi
99b1(rgyud): ba lang de bzhin no// thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa dang / so so re rnam pa dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / bya ba tha dad pa'i skyong
99b2(rgyud): kyis kyang bstan par mi spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gis rig pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis spyong de
99b3(rgyud): reg par bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ri dgos/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can gyi kha
99b4(rgyud): ma' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / blo gros dang / blo dag/ togs pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa mang lams mu med pa dang / sems kyi rgyun rnam pa ba dad pa
99b5(rgyud): togs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang / mi shes pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / mi snang ba dang / mun nag dang / 'gro ba lnga dang / 
99b6(rgyud): drug dang / khams gsub pa thog ma dang / dbum dang / 'jig par gnas pa sngon gyi mnga' deng / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su bachad par gnas par dus gsum dang / phyogs la mgo rmongs pa sku
99b7(rgyud): na ba la sogs pa na ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa la sogs pas nyin gcig bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can
99b8(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dkrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan lab bzla ba dang / 
100a1(rgyud): rtsa rnam grangs 'dal gzung ba dang / gnas thams cad gyur pa'i lam la dgod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shin du bde ba/ don dam pa/ zhi ba/ 'khrug pa med pa/ dge ba/ nad medapa
100a2(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis me mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad
100a3(rgyud): khyen pa'i ye shes la sbyar ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mgu ba'i
100a4(rgyud): sa la yang dag par gzung ba dang / chos rtogs pa'i khyad par brjod pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po ltar 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus dang / tshod las mi 'da' bar bya ba dang / de dag la rgyu
100a5(rgyud): dbang du byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de gnas par bya ba dang / 
100a6(rgyud): cig nas gcig tu lung byin pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes gams pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i rgyud kyi rgyun mi gcad pa dang / skal ba yod la
100a7(rgyud): yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te 'jug par byed pa cung zad cig bshad par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang
100a8(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing meng du byung bar gyur te dka' ba thob nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na de jel 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// 
100b1(rgyud): rkang gi tha~M kha ba can sna nyi cha ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyigs bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas pa ni rigs kyi bu stod lang
100b2(rgyud): legs so// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad blas pa de bzhin no// btsun pa bA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de skad zer ba ni teng
100b3(rgyud): 'dzin 'di'i ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhon sha chag
100b4(rgyud): ba gsung ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal ba 'di dag kyang chod du bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lag na do rje khyod kyis gang mdo sde rab mo 'di lta bu 'di dgags
100b5(rgyud): ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ba legs se legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
100b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
100b7(rgyud): kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag gzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam
100b8(rgyud): drangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams bang po dag na med 'dzin pa yang dkan na rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu
101a1(rgyud): gang+ka'i klung chad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin du 'das pa snyed chas rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes
101a2(rgyud): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyed dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dra ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lde dang / mi 'am ni dang / g+ho ba bye chen po dang / mi dang / 
101a3(rgyud): ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par
101a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i
101a5(rgyud): brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yas so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang chos kyi dgab pa dang / mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnam sa ma brdungs par kun nas sgra byung
101a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang theg rdob pa dang klu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gang byed do// spos dang / byug
101a7(rgyud): bdug pa dang / phye ba dang / gas dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bya dan dang / dpag pas mtho shing sngon pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi rkyen phreng dang / me tog pad+ma dang / su ru

101b1(rgyud): na po dang / kun nas smras dang / kun nas skyematshan thamam tog gi char gyi srin kun nas mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab po// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'dug dang / dbang phyug ca
101b2(rgyud): dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang / 'brang po dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa

101b4(rgyud): sdang ba gdon bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha sa la
101b5(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye 'ar ga'i rang

101b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa
101b8(rgyud): lelegs so legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyed rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o// de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gas
102a1(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rngub che dang / rgya mtsho dang / spyan chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i slebs lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya tshal zab pa/ thog zad
102a2(rgyud): bar dang / ba mar dge ba/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du 'thad pa/ gsal baM/ 'jebs pa/ dag pa/ mnyen pa/ snyan pa brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/

102a6(rgyud): thAT taM/ ShA/ k+Shas me/ grub pa'i tshigs kyis phyag byas ma/ sgra thams cad kyi snying kun du 'jug par byed ma/ sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma/ spang 'arab tu sdang ba thams
102b1(rgyud): snying 'jams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sa skyed pangs su spong ma/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'dra// bcur sho// dam che/ rdzas pa srungs shegasam
102b2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi steng rnams khrag la dam tshig la khod cig/ thams cad khyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ 'dig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal yo swA hA/ draT traT/ s+phoT lnga

102b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dr-i ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'apo chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can tham
102b6(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi kazhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA rmA/ de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying 'a da/  thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pan thams cad dang ldan pa
102b7(rgyud): la da 'dags pa sa skrag par gyur dag/ rkye gang kyis drung drug 'i na ma baspyod sa pa 'ad pa yin dugayo zhi sas pa zhing tshigs/ nga'i bur bus gtangs bzhin dug ga zhi nashes
103a1(rgyud): zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
103a2(rgyud): kye bu lnga'i 'khor 'di slongs shigang ma dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go// rig sngags grub pa 'byor par byed pa'i snying po la gzhol pa bsgrags so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pa
103a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM
103a4(rgyud): ki la~M/ badz+ra ki li ki pA yAsnA hA yom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying pa ma chog tugasang ba lags te/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so// des ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma pa
103a5(rgyud): bar mchi'o// da'ang mchi'o// dngos gru ba stsal bar bgyi'o// lung bzhin pakyil// ba byung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par nga shig go// sems can pa
103a6(rgyud): cad gdul bar bgyi'o// byung ba thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o// nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gasnying po
103a7(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba 'di ni 'di nas bsgral bgrangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po 'gyed pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bdegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gces pa'i tshe/ bcom lnga
103a8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dal bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin mo ltar thos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri zhes snang dpal gyis bdag la
103b1(rgyud): bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lag na da dus snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bas pa gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par gyur te/ gsang
103b2(rgyud): ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dka' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'du
103b3(rgyud): zungs shi ka/ tshangs shig/ lhogs shig/ 'dzin du chug cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des sems can mang po la yun ring
103b4(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa chags pa med pa sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro// su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang
103b5(rgyud): ga pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'dri
103b6(rgyud): dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 
103b7(rgyud): 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbul po'i rigs rnams
103b8(rgyud): mu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab med par yang ma yin/ ma dul bar me yin/ tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems brjed pa
104a1(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro// tshig gzung bar
104a2(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzong bar 'gyur ro// shes rab chen po dang / stobs brjen po dang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
104a3(rgyud): dmanyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin
104a4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi gang che zhing mtha' yas pa la
104a5(rgyud): du 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjod par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / rig sngags
104a6(rgyud): chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / mamo dang / ye dgas dang / sha ba dang / sgra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
104a7(rgyud): 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi byas par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dadu bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las khyen pa
104a8(rgyud): na pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang bsrung zhing sprad pa dang / yongs su slob par
104b1(rgyud): com pa thams cad kyang sra bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
104b2(rgyud): ga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi
104b3(rgyud): / rang 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar blangs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shi// de
104b4(rgyud): shegs pa'i chos kyi dbying ba la sa 'as pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ bdud byed kyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zungs
104b5(rgyud): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang grangs shig/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyag cu'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang blangs shi ka rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig rna
104b6(rgyud): dal rab tu 'dog pa zhes bya bar yang zus sheg/ lagan rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs shes bya bar
104b7(rgyud): / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/ de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems
104b8(rgyud): das ma pa la ma sa sa 'i 'dzin na sa she yid// khab sa dang sa su nga/  kyid
105a1(rgyud): // yin dang / nam mkha' lding dngag / me 'am med gang+gA phye chen po dngag / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / khams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de com ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa
105a2(rgyud): / bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje'i ring ba chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi ma ban po bI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dA na sad+d+hi dang / bu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes rjes bsgyur cing gus te skad gas
105a3(rgyud): kyis kyang bcos na pa gtan la laphag/ 6// t+ya gAr skad du/ Ad+ya ba dra a dze ti mdul pram ti nI nAm d+hA ra d+he/ da srad du/ 'phags pa dadza pa pham pa yi ltar ma tu rmongs byed ces bye ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang
105a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de sred 'dag gis thos padus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri rigangs riyul ste mchog/ riras kyi smad dang nad ltar gas
105a5(rgyud): tshogs kyis gang shing re'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdol ba yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang / bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug ki nad dang nags
105a6(rgyud): / gdugs dang / a gdu dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang lha'i bu rnams dang / l+h+wa ma yin rnams dang / lta ba yin gyi bu rnams dang / 
105a7(rgyud): rnams dang / drung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lded rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnamapa dang / mi 'am rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / dri zan pas dang / rig sngags 'cha grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / 
105a8(rgyud): log 'dren rnams dang / sha ba rnams dang / sdang ba dang / mi snang ba'i mam 'tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag cad lnga brgyar 'khor byed kyil labar du sbyar bar 'dus ga/ dan gnas pa'i byang chub ste
105b1(rgyud): pa' 'dun zhe lnga steng dang / dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig go// bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te/ gnas par bdeg mnyan na bde ba/ 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to// de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rna
105b2(rgyud): ba yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnams dang
105b3(rgyud): dpas dang / reg sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha ba rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i mtha'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams
105b4(rgyud): dany+tsa zhing kun dang / 'jigs pa dang nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAH thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka'
105b5(rgyud): shin bzang dag ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs te ma
105b6(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol/ de skad ces gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa sngon bu'i mchog ni bu gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan
105b7(rgyud): sa chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal chab du nye ste/ chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgengs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje'i thos lta
105b8(rgyud): dpung mgo yangs pa/ dang lta ba ba khregs pa'i byed nga ni 'od ze 'cher ba can/ de rdo'i dpung rgyan dang ldan gsus ma khregs shing sra ba dang / lagan rje dang / gags pa dang / lag na brtan po 'bar ba bogs pa
106a1(rgyud): deng pur busra pas rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du snang bar byed cing rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i sbyi
106a2(rgyud): po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rnga'i snang ba dang / de rje sdongan po dang / rin po che'i rdo rje dang / gsang ba 'do rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sags pa dang / de nga'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dpag sang rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang
106a3(rgyud): rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i yul rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams
106a4(rgyud): dang / rdo rje mim ma ngan byed rnams yang dag par skul/ rnam par skul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa thams cad la kun du snang bar byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/ gsal bar byed/ rnam pa gsal pa
106a5(rgyud): / rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par skul/ so sor skul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal
106a6(rgyud): po sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu
106a7(rgyud): rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang / 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag pa myong ba rnams kyi bas
106a8(rgyud): rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas de rje 'chang stan las langs te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston
106b1(rgyud): sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang
106b2(rgyud): 'bebs pa'i klog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to// de nas bskal pa chen po lngar rmi lam dang / mu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi
106b3(rgyud): rdzid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje
106b4(rgyud): nga chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu byin to// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang / tshul khrims dang / ting
106b5(rgyud): dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed pa/ rang gi rdo rje dang / rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags/

106b7(rgyud): 'das khro bo drag po rnams mongs par byed pa/ sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa dang / sdang ba rnams bskyod pa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams
106b8(rgyud): ramar rlog pa/ yon po rnams spong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa/ srin po rnams nges par byed pa/ rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa/ 
107a1(rgyud): gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/ nus pa rnams ston par byed pa/ gsod par byed pa gsod pa/ gnod par byed pa phung bar byed pa/ de der song nas
107a2(rgyud): lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/ de ltar drag po ba drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang / lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir skul zhing
107a3(rgyud): kyil 'khor du 'jug/ bskyod par byed/ mthu ston par byed/ rjed par byed/ rnam par skrag par byed do// stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje yi pham pa me lta
107a4(rgyud): rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs gsung ba dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnam
107a5(rgyud): ces rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/ 'od des de rab tu dka' ste rdo las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyisas gsum gyi stod gyi skar ma dang / zla ba'i 'od du brlag par byas nas snang ba gcig sa
107a6(rgyud): cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni g.yo bar byed/ klog gi 'khor lo dang / lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/ sgra drag po ni phyung / bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/ skrag pa
107a7(rgyud): byas so// den dong tsalas pa ji lta pas/ myongs byed ces bya ba'o gzugs ma skye 'od 'gro chen po kho na 'dug pa/ sgra tshigs gser dang rin po che da ga/ dang 'drang ba rdo rje'i bus zhes bya ba
107a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid las ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje 'phra
107b1(rgyud): chen po sa skyabs su song ngo // de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa/ skal ba chen po dge ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la lag cha dang 'a
107b2(rgyud): bya ba'i stobs byin cig/ de nas gzungs kyis sbas pa/ 'di dag bkra' stsal pa de bzhin du bsngo'o// zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so// thor tshugs gsum la/ sa gsum dang / dus gsumang
107b3(rgyud): khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug tho dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs
107b4(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rlung lha rnams kyi ga'i dang / shugs dang / grub pa rnams kyi mongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dmatshig dang

107b6(rgyud): skabs su rgol ba rnams dang / de bzhin du thams cad kyang skyongs shig/ mig gi 'dzum pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te smras pa/ dkon mchog
107b7(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po lag na do drug po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yaH/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hI ra Ni/ mahA u bar tA yiSh+Ta mi/ A hrI dz+dzaH/ kA Ta le/ gaTiSh+Ta
107b8(rgyud): kA ku la sha~M khe/ ka pi la ke shi/ ta Te tsi Ti me Ta ni/ karka Ta mu Ti ban+de badre/ mahA bi d+hu l-i lo le/ bu su mu su/ su mu sre ma?/ sa ra sa saM/ phaT phaT/ su d+yo te/ piM ga la tsi te/ bai la~M/ dz+wal paM ga le/ sarba
108a1(rgyud): gaN/ pra ha ha Na mA yA/ sid+d+ha dA ye ge/ su ru ke/ su ru ke/ badz+ra ko Ne/ badz+ra Did+ha/ sA ra prA ha Ne/ rat+na tra yA/ de kral bud+d+he te/ badz+ra d+ha ra bi shra sa ni ka/ a pA ti ha ta pra mad ni swA hA/ gang gsang sngags/ 
108a2(rgyud): 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam/ sgom mam/ 'dzin pa de thos na ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par

108a5(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang rin po che mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa
108a6(rgyud): bas bstod de/ snyan cing bab lang sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chu
108a7(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ye rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya
108a8(rgyud): sa rdzogs s+ho// rgyag kyi na po na medag rlu sdes dag sucan gyi ba ba la shes rjes bsgyur me sa rten dgas pa dkyis kyang so nas gta la papag/ gas
108b1(rgyud): dra s+sa m+b+ha sa pra ti ta ta nA ma d+hA dA k+She/ bod skad du/ dong phra mo thog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phywa
108b2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas bani
108b3(rgyud): 'bar ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung ste/ gas ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag
108b4(rgyud): pa'i bdag go/ gzungs kyi bdag po/ lha'i gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chu ba 'i yi bgyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags rnams rab tu
108b5(rgyud): brjod du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying po 'di rab tu smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya
108b6(rgyud): mash+tsa trUM badrA bA Na ye/ sa hA ya k+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ i ha ra ha ra badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ d+hun d+ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pab badz+ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya badz+ra/ dA ru NA tA ru NA badz+ra/ 
108b7(rgyud): badz+ra/ b+hI d+ha b+hId+d+he badz+ra/ d+h+waM swASh+Ta/ nAs sh+tsar+Na badz+ra kr-i d+hA lA/ sa la hu wa/ tiHtiH/ 5/ hu na ha na/ a mr-i ta hU~M phaT b+hA/ bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhig gis bdeg shegs bdud rtsi 'khyil
108b8(rgyud): ste/ khro ba thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing / pa spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang / 
109a1(rgyud): bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/ dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/ gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la ci ma ga d+ha sprin gyis bshig pa 'am/ skyu rur
109a2(rgyud): don pa gser kyis gzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di sa ning / do pra mo smos pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du bdug par 'gyur ro// lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcigag pa/ lo ldan rnam
109a3(rgyud): kar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis lagan rdo dang / bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gas
109a4(rgyud): rabasgrags so// rdo rje phramo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho/ #// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang
109a5(rgyud): nga chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dgu
