114b6(rgyud): ril ba bring gang chab bcus la lan 'dra rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyi ste/ drang srong gi mi smra bas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// a ba sar sar sha ba ta pa dA ma/ hr-id la grod ab suka ban+d+ha ya/ pran tsar/ su
114b7(rgyud): hA/ sngags 'di la na bdun stong 'azlas pa bgyi ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis klu gnod par sems pa thams cad tshabs gdungs par 'gyur ro// rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog chags kyi rigs thams cad mod pas
114b8(rgyud): dus sa dgur sems cad bye'o// srang bar phyogs de po tog pa gan pa mi bgyid do// srog chags kyi dgas thamasas dpa mchis par 'gyur ro// srog chags kyi gas thams pa dkris kyang ma chis
115a1(rgyud): yang sa to dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong can po la lags sa zhes bya ba gnang ste drang srong chen po lags pa legs so/ 
115a2(rgyud): / khyod ces minag kyang sems can thams cad la lags par bslang bar 'gyur ba dang / lo tog dang / ma tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ba de ltar gyis sh+log/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
115a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sded pon chen po la gan dongs 'di skad ces gsol to// slad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na rjes su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su bsrung bar 'gyid na bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis badra 'dugs pa/ lab na dong
115a4(rgyud): legs sa legs so// sems can thams cad yongs su srungs shig/ lo tog la gnod par byed pa klu'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// 
115a5(rgyud): kod pa chen po dang / yon yod pa'i mthu chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen pos kun du ston pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas su gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas dang ha cang yang ma
115a6(rgyud): na pa dang / gcigs 'phrag pa dgas shis kyims bya bsheg da/ nanas de'i ngas zhin da/ de srid se sa sa can gyi mthong po ma dang / 'du dag nags dga'
115a7(rgyud): ra dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams kun du tshim pa gyur to// skyes pa dang bud med dang / sde'u dang/ bu bo dang / bal dang / rta dang / targod pa dang / mnye dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / skye bo tshogs thams cad bdebs
115a8(rgyud): ma bar gyur te// rdzing bu de la phyogs pa ni kun du rgyung dpag cad gnyis kyi tshad do// jing bud yang me tog yud pal dang / badra dang / ku mu ta dang / bun rig sna tshogs kyis kun du khebs shing / nya sna tshogs dang / chu bran dag
115b1(rgyud): yid dang / chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang / bung ba gzugs sna tshogs can no// de nas de'i 'og tu than pa byung ba de'i tshe nags tshal dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / yal gathams cad skams te me tog de dag rnying ngo // 
115b2(rgyud): nadang chu srin dang / nya mid dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / bung ba gzugs sna chags pa de dag kyang chu pri ste cung zad cig lus pas phyags bcur rgyug kun tu chug rag rgyug ste/ srog 'gags la cu// srog chad la thug
115b3(rgyud): sa skyeng 'phang shing drug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam ring ba chen po dang / deng bu de dbyon pa dang / dren nadang chu srin dang / mu srin byis pa gas pa dang / zung ba brgya stong dum srog 'dags pa su// srog sa la phrul/ 
115b4(rgyud): phyogs bcur rgya ga cing snying rje ji ltar gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i dmigs pa snying rdzas dbugs phyung ste se gol gyi sgras klu rnams 'bod cing lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol rdob cing stong ga
115b5(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skra thug pa badzad do// sngon gyi las kyi rkyen 'ga' zhig gis srog chags de dag kyang srog ma chad do// klu chen po dag gis sgra de yang mtho / bcom ldan 'das kyang rjes su ma dran no// 
115b6(rgyud): de nas bdud kyi ris kyi gnod sbyin rnam par 'bang drung shes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i la gtan kha mas su sra bsgrags pa zhag bdud ponon par sreg pa'i bskal ba 'byung ste/ 'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas man med
115b7(rgyud): pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar dag las gang tshig par ma gur ba rlung zad kyang mi srid do// 'jig te du 'jigs pa chen po srung shes skra grag go// de nas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri ba dang lha ma yin dang nas
115b8(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lho byi chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sma thos nas kyi hud kyi drad 'jig ten ma dungs pa gyur to zhes du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rkyen gyis 'di myong bar
116a1(rgyud): mkhyen mod kyi/ 'od kyang dgongs pa yang dade/ bcom ldan 'das kyi srin mtshams kyi mdzod spunas 'od zer byung nas 'od par des klu'i khyim thams cad snang bar bas nas kyang slar 'og ste spyi bor
116a2(rgyud): kutsug tunubapa gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po gun nas gdugs pa rnam par bskor ba zhes bya bas klu thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras sa// kye klu dang bu chen po dag ci'i phyir 'od zer byung zhi
116a3(rgyud): de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtshos bsams na bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'od zer brang ba ri mthong ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mchod de/ gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu chen bcom ldan 'das
116a4(rgyud): ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od cir rab tu bkye ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lakra'o/ zer rab tu bkye ste// khang pa thams cad snang bar
116a5(rgyud): srang ljon par byed pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye klu'i bdag po dag srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po gnas pas 'gag par 'gyur ba'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya
116a6(rgyud): skad cigasang cig sung tsam de laji buca gyi rkun gyi nus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so// de nas phyogs der go skabs chen po byung bar gyur nas sa phyogs der bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen pos kun nas pa
116a7(rgyud): mdun du bdapa'i dbus na 'azhugs so// chu 'i bang can po 'dus pa ni siHb+hi/ klu'i rgyal ba stong phrag bca custe/ klu'i rgyam po mtshol sogs pa zla'i rgyal po ston nas gdugs kyi rnam pas can
116a8(rgyud): de stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / 
116b1(rgyud): sho dang / byug pa dang / rgyan dang / lnga ba lbu ba dang / na bar sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la pachod bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarang 'dug no// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhes bcom ldan 'das gangan ba de sogs su thal
116b2(rgyud): ba brgyad nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'degs pa chen po mi bzang pa 'jig rten du gleng ste/ 'dri ltar zan pa byung ning mu ge'i dgon par gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
116b3(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'dis sems can thams cad mgon ma mchis skyabs ma mchis dpung gnyen pa mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i sngags kyi tshigs bshad du gsol/ gang gis
116b4(rgyud): ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su ltung ba'i 'jig rten kun du sgrol ba dang / ha cang char che ba dang / char ma mchis pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / tshab ma mchis par
116b5(rgyud): dang / mu ge'i dkon pa rab tu ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bzlog pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang
116b6(rgyud): po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen podag klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa kun nas ra
116b7(rgyud): pa'i klog ces bya ba yod de/ de dran pa tsas kyir tha thams cad kyi khyim dang / klu thams cad kyi lus 'bar bar gyur ro// klu mi bsrungs pa thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad kyi mgo tshal ba bdun du
116b8(rgyud): pabar 'gyur ro// mig dang ma go rnams gas nas dum bu dum thung zad par 'brel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen podag krugad par sems pa dang / rab tu gnod par sems pa rnams kyi don dang sems can mams
117a1(rgyud): gi phyir zungs shig/ de nas rgyal ba chen po bzhes bcom ldan 'das sdezha pas gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po'i sngags kyi tshi gaskulas
117a2(rgyud): 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i srog ces bgyi ba bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lha sbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs stangs kyi rnam par gzigs nas klu'i lakho 'dus
117a3(rgyud): rnams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po dag nga la la gzungs kyi tshig ni sngags kyikyi to ki A mel ke pra ba re/ nA ge ma hA nA ga hr-i da ya/ a par te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarbA nA ga hr-i da ya ni/ 
117a4(rgyud): i/ nA ga gul bi d+ha na sa ni/ han ta na/ sarban gdu Sh+Ta hr-i ba ni/ ha na ta na/ sarba duSh+Ti nA ga pa ban ni/ pratsa ba ca btsal/ sab duSh+ThanA kA na/ a krim u krA mas mu tra swA gar/ bi me le/ bi kramam
117a5(rgyud): kag te/ dra ba re swA hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'de gsungs pa tsam gyis klu de dag thams cad 'di zhing lus rul te dri mi rnam par gyur to// me 'bar ba bzhin du lus
117a6(rgyud): ba'aphrul zhing 'gre ldog go// thams cad skad cher bcom ldan 'das la du zhing thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag pa ka
117a7(rgyud): stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyi snying po g.yom mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshig ste ma rungs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das deng sman cad 'thun pa
117a8(rgyud): bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid ma bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye ge nas na gnas kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag la
117b1(rgyud): bar mi bgyid do// me tog dang yal ga dang / 'bras bu dang / la tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par bgyid do// dus dus su mar gyi kun 'beb par bgyid do// bde ba dang yid bde bar bgyid do// lo tog dang me tog dang
117b2(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su sbyong bar bgyid do// bden pa'i dematshig la gnas pa bgyid do// bu gcig pa lA bkyi ba bzhin du sems can thams ca
117b3(rgyud): su skyong bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di smad pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'thun par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis kyang
117b4(rgyud): cag thams cad kyi char kyi rgyun 'beb par bgyid do// dran pa tsam gyis kyang ha cang char cha ba bzlog par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la sa log par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das yang man
117b5(rgyud): bsgrag pa'i sngags kyi tshig stsal to// de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lagatubs nas 'di skad ces smras so// tad+ya thA/ A tsa ta tsa ta bi tsata/ sha tA sha
117b6(rgyud): pa tsar ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gdugs zhag gcig chog bgyis la bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i don du'ang spu'i gling thams cad du char gyi rgyun
117b7(rgyud): ma phra ba na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga 'grus par 'gyur ro// bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar gyur du yang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das do'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas mnas bsku
117b8(rgyud): pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di co sa pa nyid du la na bdun du brjod par bgyi 'di'i 'og tu skye che'i sa bon brgya rtsa brgyad klu'i sa bon du mtshe'u dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi la kyis
118a1(rgyud): mtha' dag zhugs 'bar bar dgyur bdag shi keng rus kyi lhag ma tsam nig lus nas yongs su thar bar mgur byi bar du dum bu dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi
118a2(rgyud): bgyur gyi rgyun 'bebs par bgyid do// gal te myang ngu char gyi rgyun ma pa ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'gum pa'i dus kyi dbang du mchi'o// bu dang cha bor bcas te 'gum par
118a3(rgyud): / de nas nam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bsha
118a4(rgyud): rje ma mchis pa'i mnas bsgag pa dag bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bkrungs pa ma rungs pa gtum pa gnod par byed pa dag 'bru
118a5(rgyud): tshe mna' 'dis 'jigs par 'gyur skrag par 'gyur dus dus su char gyi rgyun ni legs par 'bebs so// dus dus su lo tog dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams bsgrub bo/ 
118a6(rgyud): la rgyal po chen po rna ma thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chog tu cher bka' stsal du gas pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chog bka' stsal pa tshor mi 'bab pa'i dus na des
118a7(rgyud): 'ab/ dkon pa'i gnas sa ma/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ su mig gam mtsho'u 'am mtsho'am/ lteng ka ma/ grod pa'am/ klu'i gnas kyi mtshe'u'am/ 'jim pa dang lci bar bsres pa'i dkyil la
118a8(rgyud): gsum bya ste/ dkyil 'apor dbus pabs khrugang bcos la la byed pa khrag bar bya'o// shin du 'angs pa dang shin su bya bar bya'o// spos sum khor zug tugator ngo ro// de'i dbus su rgyal po tsho
118b1(rgyud): bzhi bya ste/ bra ser sku'i lci ba dang 'di ma par bsres pa'i klu'i rgyal po mgo gu gdengs gcan phus dbyibs dgu bar byas te thams cad kyi mgol yang mid bzhin gyi nor bu bya'o// shang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po rgyam tsho byal
118b2(rgyud): phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya'o// dub phyogs su klu'i rgyal po chu la bya'o// byang phyogs su ku'i rgyal ba lam bu kar bya'o// de'i g.yog 'khor bdun bdun mgo gsum pa/ mgo gnyis phyi mdo lnga bur bya'o// 
118b3(rgyud): dgal spyos sna tshogs kyis byeg par bya'o// tsan dan dag da mar du / su dbyer can dang / shug pa dang/ cung ma rnams phye mar byas te gtong bar bya'o// mi tog dang me tog phreng ba gdags so// bran sa de 'i bus pa
118b4(rgyud): 'bras los dang yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o// gru bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bzhag par bya'o// phyogs chen po bzhir sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang / mdod rten ring baspel dang bcas pa/ 
118b5(rgyud): dag bkug go// dang dang bdan gyis brgyan par bya'o// mchod pa lngas mchod do// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / duru smras bdug go// rgya spos dang / nal dang / kun du du dang / yungs kar dang / gAn d+hangs dang / sran+di'i pog dang / 
118b6(rgyud): dkang 'on pas dang sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/  dbras la bdug par bya'o// dkyil 'khod kyi mtha' kun du nas phyis pad ma bri bar bya'o// slo ba ni btod langos pani de re yang
118b7(rgyud): bas gzhong ba bkang ba bdun bdun bzhag par bya'o// ka twor ma dkar po dang / ci 'byor pa'i dornam pa mang po bzhag go// me tog se lams gtor bar bya'o// bum pa bkang ba bzhi bzhag go/ bum pa
118b8(rgyud): mas dkang ba bzhi bzhag go// pig por bzhinas gu phul gyi bdug pas bdug go// me la kha brgyad dang bud do// rig pa 'dzin pas shar gyi sgo sbyin sreg bya ste/ shing kar bI ra dang / yungs kar dang ce
119a1(rgyud): dmar po bsres te lan brgya rtsa brgyad dor to// dor ba brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs te 'dza m+bu'i gling thams cad du phyogs bzhi kun nas char gyi rgyun 'bebs
119a2(rgyud): so klu de dag thams cad 'dir char 'bebs so// 'dri ni chog dang po'o// // yungs kar gyi mer dang / sbrang ci drang shing kar bI ra'i me tog dang / nA ga gser dang btags pa'i ril bu byas la/ 
119a3(rgyud): nas ril bu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te klu'i mtshor bor ma thag tu klu thams cad dga' bar gyur te/ char gyi rgyud chen po 'bebs so// gal te de ma thag ma phab ra klu de dag thams cad lus zhig par
119a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// klad pan par 'gyur sdug bsngal chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni chog gnyis pa'o// // sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal pa dang / cab mo dkrugs la sngags lan drug cu bzlas pa bya ste/ khyi
119a5(rgyud): ce nang du pon po ma thag tu klu thams cad 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i phyir char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// gal te de ma thag tu ma phab na klu thams cad kyi lus la sha bkra 'byung zhing mdzes btab par 'gyur
119a6(rgyud): long bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gsum pa'o// shug pa dang ut+pal sngon po dang / ba lA dang / zangs byedang yungs kar dang / in dra h+ya sta dang / pa la sha bsres te bur ma khu bas smras pa shes
119a7(rgyud): rab can gyis sngags lan brgyad cu bzlas te/ ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus ril bu bdun klu'i khyim du bor na nyin mtshan bdun char 'bebs so// gal te 'dral du ma
119a8(rgyud): pha ban de'i klu'i khyim chu thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// klu'i khyim na gnas pa thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// ril bu gcig rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te klu'i mtshor gzugs so// 
119b1(rgyud): bdan sngon po gdags so// sngags 'di bris te der gdags pa byas na nga srid du rgyal mtshan ma bsdus pa de srid du klu thams cad mar 'bebs so// yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te yang thog mthon pa
119b2(rgyud): gzugs so// ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na yang klu rnams ser ba 'bebs kyang mi nus so// klu rnams kyis gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ste/ klu thams cad dngangs skrag cing gnas der 'dod pa
119b3(rgyud): bzhin char 'bebs so// oM su bA ti badz+ra dun+de me mi li swAhA/ 'di ni sngags so// bag phyi las klu mgo dgu pa'i gzugs byas la lus mtshal gyis bslu bar bya'o// mgul du ba dan gdags so// da
119b4(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi byas te dbus su klu'i gzugs bzhag la me tog silA mas gtor ro// gtor ma dkar po ci 'byor tshad sbyin no// me tog dang bdug spos kyang sbyin no// bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la la na tsi
119b5(rgyud): rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te/ sngags dang bal po se'u shing gi lcug mas klu'i gzugs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab pa byas na klu gang gi ming bris pa'i klu de bkug par 'gyur te/ 
119b6(rgyud): kyis sa dga' bar mi 'gyu ro// gal ter gyi rkun legs pa ma pa can 'dral du sronam rus par 'gyur ro// lungs gang la phan stong ca brgyad re rel yongs su bzlas pa byas /  stong rtsa bcud du tshang naklu'i gzugs
119b7(rgyud): rnams cad 'gro nga mig gdangs gabyed do// de'i 'og tu bal po sabu'i lkug pas bsdigs na lngang shing lce ston par 'gyur/ lus kyi bar du ston par 'gyur klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ gang bsgo ba de bzhin kye
119b8(rgyud): / 'om dang / yungs kar la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te/ gnas thams cad du gtor nathams cad la phyir legs pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ni tshig pazhi pa'o// de nas nu'i rgyal po kyi
120a1(rgyud): mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che bkru'i rgyal po brgya stong stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
120a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// las bsgrub pa shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dang 'dra bar
120a3(rgyud): bshad per bgyi'o// dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// slan chad sems can dgel rnam par 'tsho bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu mi bgrangs pa rnam par 'tsha
120a4(rgyud): bgyid pa rnams kyi don dud mi tshigam 'tshal ba rnams bzlog pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ klu'i bdag po dgangs dam tshig gi sngags
120a5(rgyud): kyis brlabs kyis de shod cig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mun le/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+yathA/ b+hu b+hu dze sa ma ya b+hU de tata b+h+ye de pra b+ha ra b+hu dzes man ta Aka byung / du ru d+ha ru swA hA/ sa ma la pA wa ne sA
120a6(rgyud): dgas sa tse ta ni sA hA/ bcom ldan 'das smad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi bgrangs pa thams cad slar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis dam tshig gi sngags 'di bo shad do// ha rba bachar che ba'i tshed dge
120a7(rgyud): dkon pa'i tshe dang / sa dang ser ba 'beb pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya'o// brjod par bgyi'o// de nas klu thams cad bskul bar bgyi'o// rig pa 'dzin pa des shin tu khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mar bgyis
120a8(rgyud): sas rab bgos te klu'i gnas su mchi bar bgyi'o// klu'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod
120b1(rgyud): na dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag ste spos chab kyis bkru bar bkyi me tog dang / bdug pas mchod par brdzi/ klu kun yang bkru bar bgyi'o// sru bsil ba'i chab de la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas pa
120b2(rgyud): bgyis te/ de'i nang du spangs kar stsal nas mtsha'u de'i nang du po zhing phyogs bzhi nas bdug pas bdugs na/ de bo ma jug tu skad cig del klu'i gnas 'gul zhing du blta bu byung nas sprin lji kyil lo bo rjen
120b3(rgyud): por gyur te nam mkha'i dkyil de khebs par char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// se rab 'bab pa
120b4(rgyud): klu'i phyogs su gtor bar bgyi'o// srer pa mi 'beb pa dang / klu thams cad kyang gcod par 'gyur ro// sad dang ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung rab tu ni par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho'am khron pa'am/ 
120b5(rgyud): snying ka 'am rdzing bu'i 'gram mam/ ri'i rtse mor shing arga dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog gis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
120b6(rgyud): sreg byas ma thag tu char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// hacang char che ba'i dus na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po zlog par 'gyur ro// 
120b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis dgung gsum gyis tshwar gyi rgyun ma pab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// long ba dang / lus dri mi rnam par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas/ 
120b8(rgyud): dang chos dang dge 'dun slu bar bgyid pa lags so// 'jig rten gsum bslu bar bgyid pa legs so// bdag cag klu'i ste gnas 'pho bar gyur cig// bcom ldan 'das gzhan thams cad la yang sbyor bar
121a1(rgyud): bgyid na thams cad dung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dag dbugs phyung / dam tshig la bkod nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la yongs sum tad/ 
121a2(rgyud): rjes su gtad nas sa phyogs de nas gshegs so// nam thos kyi bu ni gan la bzhugs so// klu'i dam tshig ces bya ba cher 'bebs pa'i skabs rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs
121a3(rgyud): pa'i khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa dang / lha'i tshogs du ma lhags byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po yang lhags/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang
121a4(rgyud): phyag chen po dang / klu'i dbang po ma chu che ba thams cad kyang lhags/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po gser mig gi 'dab ma can/ rdo rje'i mchu can bdag nyid chen po la sa 'bar shi r+tha
121a5(rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i rtsal can rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig dang / gser gyis spras pa'i cod pan mgol thogs pa/ gser gyis klubs badrag po'i ga
121a6(rgyud): klu'i dbang po gdun du ting ba/ g.yog 'khor mang gi thams cad dang lhags so// gnod sbyin gyi dang gro ku dong gnod sbyin bye ba dang / rdordo 'dzin gamig mthor rin 'dzin stong lhags te/ bcom ldan
121a7(rgyud): 'das ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ mu tig dmar po tha dad pa mang pos brtson pa'i seng+ge'i khril bzhugs pa// khA dpa brtsegs pa na zham ring chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
121a8(rgyud): kyi ba gyi kyis 'as sarnapas dunas skye sa min bya kyi gas sbyi gi / de'i sem / 
121b1(rgyud): 'bar/ nyi ma ltar ni snang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba 'od 'dom gang bas ni sku legs par brgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni shin tu rnam par dag cing shin
121b2(rgyud): drim dang skyon med pa'i 'od ni gsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas sku las 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par
121b3(rgyud): mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la bltas nas 'dzam+bu'i gling na klu ma bgrungs pas sadi dang / ser ba dang / rlung dang / ser sbyin
121b4(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad dang / lo tog thams cad dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / sman gyi bar bsregs te/ ma rungs par byas nas/ yal g.yang
121b5(rgyud): gling na med par byas te ma rungs par byas na/ de na sems can de dag sdug byasngal chen pos gzir cing nyam thag pa'i skad byung ba thos so// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos
121b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'dri skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das klu gnod par sems pa gtum po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bshig ste/ thams
121b7(rgyud): parlangs par bgyis nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lha'i dbang po dag 'di ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin ga
121b8(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyi byin gyis brlabs la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam ma
122a1(rgyud): lding bsgyings pas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba kun nas me lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu su dras
122a2(rgyud): pa gnyis rab tu 'gyur te/ 'bir lathag tu tha thams cad kyi lus rab tu 'bar ba pa 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas gdugs kyis rnam par bskor bas bcom ldan 'das kyi napas gnyis lag
122a3(rgyud): te'adi sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cheg lags so// de ba gshegs pa chog lags so// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis cing mi gsung bar gnang nas sde du rnam par gzigs te phyogs btsu na
122a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhes te na ma mkha' lding gi shugs chen pos kun tu 'bar brnam pa' lding gi gzi brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rjes su dgongs so//

122b1(rgyud): bi d+hang la/ hUMhUM/ yA / pra la ta sa rba ba tam shi meg/ rA sha pa nA sha ya/ sarba nA ga pal bta/ pa nadun+dan/ A ga pA la/ su sha nA gan/ garda ga dza ma hA ga ru khegan/ hUM hUM/ phaT phas/ swAs+yA nIni
122b2(rgyud): bal/ sa ma pa N+Dim trA traM/ ya / swAm+b+ha pa/ gi ti ba su mran/ sabarbA ga N+DI ti/ si traMhUM/ ya ya~M/ b+h+yo nAg pa ti ti/ phaHtheb srogs me tam rtseg ng+gA sa zungs ta /

122b5(rgyud): tA ya sAt+ma/ nA ga k+ko la swAt+ma/ nA ga ba ta rA ya swAt+ma/ oM swAt+ma/ sar+b+ba swAH/ pu bswAt+ma/ tathA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+rait+ma/ trai lek+Sha pU ra tA ya swAhA/ ang+kung+ku/  hUMtrAM/ ya la/ klu'i bdag po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i

122b8(rgyud): dkyis 'thor byed pa/ bud btung mar bcas pa dang / blon par bcas pa dang / mang ga gzhug par bcas pa dang / la dang bcas pa lpags pa'i skabs byedag/ rlung gi stobs byed pa/ sdud pa dag stobs byed
123a1(rgyud): kun thams cad 'thun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gnang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyi ma'i na khyi ma'i dus na'adam bu'i gling 'di po nyin
123a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad dang / rdzas dang / shing dang / sman thams cad kun tu bsrung bgyis shig/ dus dus su char gyi spyan rdzob cig/ bdag gi srogaci la ba de bzhin du 'bam+bu'i
123a3(rgyud): dwagi sems can thams cad tas par byed pa/ ma tog dang / 'bras bdud/ l+r-i tig rnams yongs su srungs shig/ gal hU~Mgashin du 'gyur bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sung dge bltar ma byasan/ 
123a4(rgyud): tshe klu thams cad kyi khyi ma kun tu 'bang / rab tu 'bar kun tu 'gyu / me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cig/ thul su ga chen po'i thung b.ra'i myur cig/ stobs bri zhing brtson 'grus ma rungs par gyur cig/

123b1(rgyud): bsrung bar bya'o// bsgrub par bya'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i

123b8(rgyud): sto phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun yod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa chen pos mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtug

124a3(rgyud): rang lo tog sgrubs shig/ rlung dang / sprin dang / sir ba rnams cad cig cig/ chud rabar ma byed cig/ kwa'i bdag pa dag de'i phyir khyod phyi ma'i tshekhyi ma'i dus na gnod pa med par gnas par gyis shi/ 
124a4(rgyud): 'ibadag po dag gal te yang dag par mchog mi bsrungs na de'i phyir bu'i bdag po dag byed mnyes pa chen por 'gyur ro// zhes smra'o// thog mar klu bskul ba'i rig pa rjen ma spro// / de nas de'i 'og tu/ 
124b1(rgyud): ka'i rig pa'i chog gu rnams kyi khros pazhi bar byed pa nam mkha' lding 'bar ba'i ga'i brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di brjod par bya'o// thog mkhon gnam du bltas te/ yungs kar dang chu bsres pa phyogs

124b8(rgyud): tab par 'gyur ro// gal te rig pa 'dzin pas myur du ma bskyabs na rigs thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro// bu dang / tsha bo dang / 'khor du bcas pa dang / bzhon
125a1(rgyud): pa bcas te rnam par med par 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur/ char med pa'i dus na lungs gang la lan stong bzlas te/ khyim la gtor na/ klu thams cad 'ad med ye cing / khyim dang mchom khyer
125a2(rgyud): ba gcig tu gyur te/ 'dod pa bzhin du myur du char kyi rgyun 'bebs pa// yang da ya mar gyi rgyun la bas so// gang gi tshe char dgos pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas mu dang yungs ka la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa
125a3(rgyud): byas te/ gnas mthon por song la shang phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas chu snyim pa bdun la sngags la lan bdun bdun du yongs su bzlas te/ shar phyogs su gtor na bu'i rgyal po sems cad 'dral dug cig tu 'dus te
125a4(rgyud): char kyi rgyun 'debs so// skya rengs shang ba'i dus na yungs kar dang / zu bum dang cur bsres la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhi gtor shing snying dang na tu yang gtir nas dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / se ba

125a6(rgyud): nyid kyi mar dang / 'o ma dang / gcin blangs la sa ba ta byis kadang / bag bye dang / thams cad bsres lalan dgu bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas pa byas te/ de nas klu mgo lnga pa bya'o// mgo ga dengs kacan gyi skyil mo krung bcas pa

125a8(rgyud): matogs lal ga to/ ma pa gang bani bag go// da' 'i 'dugs/  bad /  zhig gas/  kyi byas su tom banan no// kyil la shi seM
125b1(rgyud): gi btsugs so// con sna lnga'i spyad pas lan lnga bsang // kun la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te las bya'o// bum pa'i mgul dang byis brjing ngo // na la dang / sraci pog dang / s+ya spos dang / kun du dang / sen modang

125b3(rgyud): nyid kyis nye reg dang / blag bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / gos gdags pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / khrus bya ba rnams bya'o// kU la shar phyogs su

125b5(rgyud): yungs kar re re la bzlas la klu'i gzugs la bsnun par bya'o// mar me ba bzhi 'bud do// klu'i ming bri'o// gang pos bde 'grang bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na klu'i rgyal po chen po dbang du 'gyur ro//

125b7(rgyud): mas cad byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim bzhin du yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gzugs de gnas dben par bzhag pa/ metod dang 'dug pa sbyin no// yang yong med par banag cing mi mthong bar byaste/ yul yang mi sna
125b8(rgyud): do dgos gtsang mas dgab po// nam dgos pa yod pa de'i tshe yungs kar la la ni brgyartsa brgyad bzlas pa bste/ bsnun na dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gar btang ba der 'gro ning slar yang 'ong ngo // rmil ma
126a1(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad ston cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / sa dbyung ba de'i tshe ste rmo'o
126a2(rgyud): 'bru dang / yungs kar du bsres la lan brgyan gcig bzlas pa byas te/ khros pas klu gzugs la bsnan na skad cig de la drung drang/ ser ba dang/ sprin med par 'gyur te thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro// zan pa
126a3(rgyud): 'bril la srud pa dmar po dkris la skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ klu'i mgul du btags la klu'i spyi bor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas na skad cig de la char gyi rgyun 'bebs/ 
126a4(rgyud): sgrub pa po de ltar 'dod pa bzhin chur 'bebs so// hi ca mar chen srud po sngon po la lan bdun ba zlas pa byas te/ mdud pa bdun pongon char chen po mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// chog dang rig pa bsgrub pakan/

132a6(rgyud): lan lta bar yang mi bgyid na 'jug pa sti ci spos kyang kyi 'tshal// de nas 'di'i chog brjod de/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis kluthams
132b1(rgyud): da kyi yul dus bu dum bur 'phrul lo// lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro// sungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na klu thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad bdun thar lo yug tu
132b2(rgyud): pa rnams bcad par 'gyur ro// dengal lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ klub zlog par bya'o// lan gcig brjodan drung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad bzlog go// thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dra kyi
132b3(rgyud): sa kyis ser ba thams cad skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te 'bab na yang yud tsam gyis chur 'gyur ro// ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dor bskor na/ phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'drim par 'gyur te/ phyogs
132b4(rgyud): der ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// nang par dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog tu zhugs la/ skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcings te/ sngags lan sum nu cu gnyis brjod de brjod ma thag tu rlung dang / sprin dpa
132b5(rgyud): sar ba thams cad med par 'gyur ro// rlung thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig klu dkor du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// rlung dang / 
132b6(rgyud): dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bu dang tshab 'a khor dang bcas brgyan tu rkun mi 'chan par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// dril rje
132b7(rgyud): lalan nyi cu gcig bzlas te/ ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dkrol na ma bsrun pa thams cad kyi kyang nga 'gas par 'gyur ro// nam mama' las sa 'asrung bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 
132b8(rgyud): garungs 'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gan sa/ 
133a1(rgyud): mas ldan thathams can thams ca la khan pa dang / bde dang / sum bstan pa/ snying med ga/ 'tsha ba rnams gdul ba dag / chung gcad pa dang / chad pas gcad pa'i phyi khyod ces
133a2(rgyud): rig pa chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod nas 'dza m+bu'i gling du bzhag pa legs so legs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam par kun nas bskor ba dang / gzhan yang
133a3(rgyud): ma mtshan thog 'dzi khru tshul che ba dang / gnanas ma btsun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag com ldan 'das gal bded dod ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyin pas mamag thos phyag la te
133a4(rgyud): ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cig 'a khor dang bcas pas smad ma'i tshe// smad pa'i dus na 'ang su'i gling thams cad kyi me tog deng / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / lo ma drang / 
133a5(rgyud): gnas sde bstsu ba cwo'o// ngos su sgrung ba med do// rlung bu sprin dang / sang ba dang sa dang / tshang bathams cad btsun par bgyid do// ngas dus su tshar gyi rgyan 'thabs par tshal lo//  na
133a6(rgyud): yi sa kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i da mchog bskyang bar 'jala'i// sems can thams cad kyi ba yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa grub par 'tshal lo// mi'i tshi ba 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gal te cho ga'i rgyal
133a7(rgyud): po 'di las gong du sngags dang / gzungs ji skad pa shad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthur cig/ 'di ni thobang ba ste/

133b1(rgyud): dang / zan pa bdang / dus ma lags pa'i cha dang / rlung dag sprin dang / seng bdang / sa dang / dus ma lags pa'i drung dang / klog byung na/ ri'am khang pa mthan pa'i steng du rig pa 'dzin
133b2(rgyud): su 'altas te/ mna' 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun 'arjod pa// chu nga yungs kar bsres pas phyogs pa zhir gtor bar bya'o// gtor cing dran ma thag tu tu rnams cad kyi lus rnams dum dzub rgya 'a chu
133b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gyes par 'gyur ro// 'gug par 'gyur te/ de'i slad du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po khyed kyis de ltar byos shig/ rdo rje mchu'i cho ga

133b8(rgyud): kyis tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jig dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhil bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams ngas sems can thams cad kyis don dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi
134a1(rgyud): brlabs kyis khyod kyis smos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhes gzungs sngags 'di sbas te/

134a6(rgyud): // 'jam da na hrI ng+ga la swA/ ma ny-id m+b+hi la s+ho/  'ad ni'i / ma kyi

134b6(rgyud): kyis dus phyi ma'i tshe 'das pa'i gling gi sems ca thams ca la gnad par mi gyipa me dug 'anas ngad/ gton dang / los dang gal gathams cad srung bar kyid/ rlu da/ song ba thams padad

135a2(rgyud): bar char 'bab pa'am/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser pa dang / zang ba'i rlung dang/ gnam phyogs srung tsho na 'dzin gyi gro tshig 'dis gags/ sa mtshan pa'am/ ri'i steng du yang rung/ shed rdzogs

152b5(rgyud): p+'u b+hu ka b+hUr+Na d+hAr+m+ma/ I She /  /  dz+haiM shI d+hI/ mahA badz+ra b+hai po/ ka Na pa ti drA pa ya ti rA tAM/ tshig sa dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / byad stemathams cad gcad pa yi ni pa'i
152b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ sems khros pas mtshan chal lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ sal btsugs na de ma thag tu byed de/ mu thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlo// 
152b7(rgyud): par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na da kra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
152b8(rgyud): te/ bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// ser ba bzlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing sgra yang ha cang gseng mi mtho bar brjod na/ klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 
153a1(rgyud): / chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni rang gi rdzas rnams sungs kang la la na bdun sngags na thub par 'gyur ro// nad ge bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang 'thun pa'i sman rnams tshul lan bdur sdug tu
153a2(rgyud): te 'thungs sa ma thugs nan las grol par 'gyur ro// las gang byed pa thams cad la 'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs
153a3(rgyud): gzungs zhes bya ba/ ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs s+ho// / 'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam yang yang // rdo rje 'jigs byung
153a4(rgyud): sa bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di// kun gyi thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban de skye
153a5(rgyud): 'od 'byung la gnang ngo / 5/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab skyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gsung ga/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po
153a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi bab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i sa stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di/ 
153a7(rgyud): sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul mi gnas pa dang / ba lal mgus pa dang / bsod rnanams chung ba dang / dad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags tshal ba dang / rtag tu bang pings brkas pa/ 
153a8(rgyud): dag ga sa dre pas dag ga mam kyi na // she sa nga dzin dag / gcig pa dang / sa da de da / 
153b1(rgyud): khan kha na/ khA da khAd/ khA hi khA hi/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/

154a4(rgyud): hu lu hu lu// ga ga ShA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o// de nas 'di dag gi snying
154a5(rgyud): sgrub pan bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bten cing legs par bzlas brjod babyis pa dang / bsgrub par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal lo// del 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// ma a mr-i hi ts+tsha

154a7(rgyud): med ning rten med par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das bdag gi skyabs ya du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ zhes de skad
154a8(rgyud): nga grashings ga sor du gtugs so// ce kye log 'dredam rungs pa rnams longs la ba nga tan ci// rdo kun du 'bar shing rab tu 'bar bkun du ra btu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo gshas

154b4(rgyud): 'dod na dri kyi na rtag tu 'brang ni/ khogan dun rnams cang grags mchim ga// til dang / kun chung dang / 'bras dang / ben che yang da/ rnam 'khrung bar btu //  bang rgya ste/ ma / 
154b5(rgyud): nga bar zen kyang ci'i gsang sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thub sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so//

155a1(rgyud): dbar dbus ldang ba/ spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mcheb 'phyir// me gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol// g.yas pa rdo rje ral gre bsnams// g.yon pa zhags pa lcags kyu'o// 
155a2(rgyud): tha ma sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol// blo gtsang med pa'i las dag brtson// gdug basprul gyis dbu lus brgyan// 'jigs dngangs med par brtul zhugs spyod// khro rgyal khyod
155a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs pa kun las slob par mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bskyod// nad dang rims las bsrung
155a4(rgyud): bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi gtsang zas dang mi gtsang gos// thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gdon// thams cad ma lus dga'
155a5(rgyud): 'dra mdzad// nad dang ribs drong dal ga yam sa// bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bskyod// bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsom// ma~M gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar mdzad// skye ba rnams ni
155a6(rgyud): mi sber mdzad// lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad// dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod// blo ba'i rgyal po sla brtsegs khyed// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// gang dag khyod la ma
155a7(rgyud): narnams// lus bde sems bde dbang po bde// bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus dag sems dag dbang po dag/ dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus gcod sems gtsang dbang po gtsang //

155b1(rgyud): dgapa 'dra srid sogs// gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di thos na// sdug bsngal zhenas bde bar 'gyur// gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar bar 'gyur// shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur// me long ba/ 
155b2(rgyud): dwags bya gyur// nam mtha' bzhin du dang byu shu// sa dpapa ma 'khod pa ste// !gas ga pa// da/  bsams pargyal 'gyur te// gnanas makun/ 
155b3(rgyud): bar mdzod// klo ba'i rgyal po smra brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar sprad du/ Ar+ya bIg+h+nAn pri nA ya kA ra tra d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel
155b4(rgyud): ba'i gzung gi 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ti tshal mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga' reben po zhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis

159b8(rgyud): kA nAts+tshed br-i ter b+ha ba tu ra rbo N+yad/ ka la ho g+hal du/ bi bAts+tshed yA sa ma ga ma swA hA/ nag po'i phyogs kyi chos brgyad dam/ tshes bcu bzhi la brtsams te/ nim pa'i yi ma shing ni

161b1(rgyud): lag la bkrus dbang du byed do// dbang phyug chen po'i rtags kyi lho phyogs kyi gdong gi bad du 'dug par byas nag/ khri phrag gcig sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pa des/ me tog dbar pos bci/

165b1(rgyud): sel sa dan ci'i ming dang spes pa phye ba'i khung bur bcug pa'i pags pa yes la bkab ste/ budu med gcer bus gtun shing lag pas bzung bsal na bdun du mngon par sngags te/ nub mchog ma'i

165b3(rgyud): la'i lo ma la mngon par bris te khung bu'i nang du bcug la hU~M khrung du bzhag ste/ sal ma ltung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas kha bcad la rdul gyis de'i steng du g.yogs na kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro// oM pU ri h+ya man/ 
165b4(rgyud): saka tu pra s+pho e AM che ge mo ba d+hA ma ra ya hUM phaT/ ming gi yi ge dang sngags kyi yi ge bar bar du spel la ar+g+ha'i lo ma la sol bas bris te dkris la/ tsher ma mang po btsugs la khang pa'i nang gi steng gi
165b5(rgyud): dbus su sngags pa rgya phyag brgyad bzlas te ba rkos la sras na kha 'ching bar byed do// de ltar byung po yang so por bya'o// na mo rAd na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ pA rA yA sa
165b6(rgyud): 'i b+h+yaH/ 2sa sbyong du thugs kyi sdi bas gzugs brgyan byas / rig papacwa zhing 'gron bu dkyul brtan / m-ig gnyis dang 'a ngan pa gnyis dang sde ba dang mag pa gnyis dang bshang ba'i ma mad
165b7(rgyud): rkyen no// dgra bo'i kha ru zhag lon pa'i phyi sa bcug pa rig pa 'di yang lan brgyad brgya du bzlas te/ kham skyong gnyis pas kha bkab la gtsang ba'i gnas su yanag na yul chos las gzhan las rgyal
165b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bsnyen pa ma tshag cig no// so shes sas bya ba / sa su rgyam rgyas pa 'i len/ shes su ban d+ha / sa rdzas thA bA 'aM/ nga ba'i thangs dang
166a1(rgyud): thegs ma chog gi skyes pa'i sgra dang / char mnan rolab tud btu mngon par 'azlas te// byi ba'i khung bur bcug la rdul zhes bkang na la 'cheng bar 'gyur ro// ta d+hu ha la sapa
166a2(rgyud): la bkod na du khrod kyi bsrung ba'o// hUM ha rig pa bzlas te 'phral du ro bsregs pa'i bal ba chad par bzung lal bar da bzlas pas g.yon pa hU~M gi phyag rgya bcings te/ bral pa de dang ku mu la

178b6(rgyud): sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar thod po'i nang du bcug ste/ drag po'i mgor bcug na ci srid 'tsho mgor thod pa gnas kyi bar/ de srid dgos pa thams cad srub cing / mchog nas/

179b2(rgyud): drug/ nod sbyin mo mdun du 'ongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gtor ma dkar po yon tu phyin par bya'o// brtse pa'i ka' tshul cig kyis ba gyes pa dang / reg 'dzin kyes k+Sha dang rlab dang nga

180a2(rgyud): nga'i lcug mas dkrug cing / de nas mi mgo bar bar 'gyur te/ des thig ler byas na/ nam mkha' la 'gro zheng / rig 'dzin dang thabs cig rol bar 'gyur ro// snying gar this
180a3(rgyud): le byas na/ mi sdang bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa der zhugs par 'gyur ro// mig la bsdus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi slothams cad sgrib pa med pa

180a6(rgyud): byas te/ lan bdun sngags bzlas nas/ snying gar btab na/ de ma thag tu nyung rum du 'gyur ro// nag po'i phyogs kyi chos bcu bzhi la dur khrod du zhugs nas/ sngags lan nyi shurtsa
180a7(rgyud): rjes su dran par byas ni/ han can blangs nas ser byer dang lhan cig bsregs te la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/ mig la bsdus na/ skal ba mchog dang / rig 'dzin du ldan zhi
180a8(rgyud): gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten kun dang mdza' zhing thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// ro tsa na la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/ thig le byas na skal pa
180b1(rgyud): mchog dang dgos pa thams cad 'grub cing / bud med kun dbang du gyur nas 'gro ba thams cad mdza' bar 'gyur ro// bos na rtsod pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
180b2(rgyud): zlas pa'i chus bkrus nas/ gtor na thos pa'i rgyal po zhi bar 'gyur ro// mdza' zhing 'dzin pa dag tu 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang gu gul gyi pog gis bsgrub par bya'o// gang mkha
180b3(rgyud): bsrub pa'i cho ga gsum pa ste/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ArA nga b+ha la shrIn+ta ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po// 
180b4(rgyud): gnod 'dzin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje kyang lo can gyi gnas dam pa na 'khor gnod sbyin du mas bskor
180b5(rgyud): zhugs so// de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal la gsang ba ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba de dag zhi pa'i phyir rang gi srog gi snying po dang
180b6(rgyud): deg sngags khyod kyis sten cig/ des kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas gnod 'dzin dpal gyis gsol ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das// sems can sdug bsngal zhi ba'i

185b1(rgyud): pa'i las rnams kyang // sdig pa kun las rnam par bro ba// de bzhin skye ba 'di la rmongs// shin du sdig pa mi bzad byas// gnod sbyin dbang po gzi brjid che// gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis kya//

185b3(rgyud): rang ton// dbul ba dang ni yid mi bde// sems ni nad kyis gzir ba dang // gdon dang byad dang sbyar ba yis// de yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// lha dang zhwa dang dri ra dang // lha min dang ni mkha' lding //

185b5(rgyud): par gyur na lta ci smos// gang zhig dad pas de bzhin rtogs// gus pas brtan pas gzhan mi 'jug/ 'di la gus pas don du bsnyen// bslab pa sdom pa sogs pa yis// des na 'bad pa gtsang
185b6(rgyud): snga bya// med las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ gtsang zhid dben pa'i sa phyogs su// shing gi 'bras bu sna tshogs bcas// pus nub tsam gyis sa sbyangs pa// ba li rnam lda byug par bya/ 
185b7(rgyud): mnyam par brdung zhing bcag par bya// lag mthil lta bu'i mnyam pa la// khru tshad nyi shu tsam la ni// gnod sbyin dbang po mngon par bsngags// me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram// A gar
185b8(rgyud): bdug pas bdug pa dang // nyi ma bzang po de bzhin gara'// de bzhin dus chod bzang ba la// dkar po'i phyogs pa legs par dge/ slob dpon legs par bsdogs pa yis// ba yi rnam
186a1(rgyud): rdzas lags par spyang // bdag nyid sngags bzlas rgyal ze yis// snga dro dag par gyur pa yis// mnyam par gzhag pas bzung bar bya// steng dang 'og dang phyogs dru/ 
186a2(rgyud): sku// phyogs ni de bzhin brjeng par bya// gnod sbyin rgyal ba rnaM yi chus// mkhas pas bcwa rtsa brgyad du bsngags// de ltar shAr logs mngon par gtor// phyogs bcing ldan
186a3(rgyud): rim pa bsnyen// gzhon nu ma yis bkal ba ste// oMn lnga la mi srud pa la// kur kum chu yis phyags pa dang // war ga ng+yas shing la byas// shar gyi phyogs nas brtsam par bya// hrI/ 
186a4(rgyud): gdab snga dro'i dus pa'o// klu bzhi pa sa b+h+yo bzhi pa// bu re bzhi re'u mig bzhi dang ldan// de la dang po'i dkyil du ni// de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya// rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi// 
186a5(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa zla ba'i 'od// de 'og gnod spyan dbang po ni// mtshan nyid thams cad mtshon pa yi// sngon po sprin lte bu 'i mdog/ rten ser pa yis mdzes pa dang // rkeng gdu/ 
186a6(rgyud): lag gdu' mgul can dang // rin chen sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa// seng ge'i gdun la rin chen dang // sna tshogs pa dang rnam par brtan// ri ma sna tshogs rin chen 'od// 'odra 'dram
186a7(rgyud): 'ong 'bar ba'i 'od// skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa legs par mdzes// de nyid dbus bu nor bu b.ring pos nges par bya// rab tu 'bad pas g.yas pa'i phyag// mchog sbyin sa
186a8(rgyud): 'on yongs su bya// de bzhin du ni g.yon po'i phyag/ ne'u le ren chen ga pa'o// sna tshogs gter rnams steng na legs par bzhugs// de bzhin dung dang pad ma yi // 
186b1(rgyud): nu char ni 'be'ang ba'o// rlungang bdag g.yas dang g.yon du'o/ nga du natsunas// banod sbyin babang po rdul yang san+dan// mkhas pas sngar bzhin du ni dgod// spyod
186b2(rgyud): ba'i dbang po gdong dbang po// g.yas dang g.yon du bya ba'o// rnam pa kha dog 'dra ba yi// gter gyi steng du yang dag bzhugs// de yi 'og tu gnod sbyin mo// bdun po dag ni bre bar
186b3(rgyud): // de las gzhan du ba dgu ste// de las gzhan ni chu skyes so// rin chen lte ba nor sbyin dang // gnod mdzes dang ni gnod mdzes gzhan// lha mdzes dang ni ste chen po// mtshams su
186b4(rgyud): bzang po'o// 'phar ma gnyis la dgod bya ba'o// gnod sbyin dbang po stobs po che// gnod gnas hu luhra lu dang // sde mdzes dang na
186b5(rgyud): dang // lce dbar dang ni gsus po che// bram bu gsum pa la bya 'o// gnod sbyin mo na sku mdzes ma// chen ma dang dra ba la ma// bre mo blo gros snying po spyan// pad ma'i snying po sprin mdzes
186b6(rgyud): // gnod sbyin lag pa la ga mang po// sprin chen ma dang sra mdzes ma// gter ci phreng ba g.yam pa mo// sngon shing phreng ba brang ba mo// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras stor ma// yid shugs ma dang 'dod
186b7(rgyud): gzugs ma// thos dag ma dang lnga mdzes ma// rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam bshad pa// nyi shu mchog ni ster ba'o// ci lnga'i ram pas rnam dgod pa// ji ltar mdun dang phyogs gzhan dgod/ 
186b8(rgyud): / dbang po la sogs go bar bya// de rnams phyi rol dra ba ste// rdo rje shag ti dbyug pa dang // ram grizhags pa byas mtshan dang // 'khor mo rtse gsum mtshon cha rnams// sngar ba zhin du na
187a1(rgyud): dgod pa // stong mo// mda' 'dra dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'bar ba'o// mkhas pas phyi rol du ni dgod// de nas spyan drang brtsam par bya// tshon rje ldan dkar ba dang /

187a3(rgyud): pa yi chags// nag ge sa ra ke su dang // dri dang bdug pabaston pa dang // bshos gtsang gtor ma kun 'dod

187a5(rgyud): / de khyed kyis pa gon par // 'ad sa rnams 'byung ban/ ma sa sen dus /  cib skyel pa rnams cad pa'i dzu pa so/ 3

188a2(rgyud): chen pa'i sngags so// tsan dA sum hi su ra pu tsi ti tsan d+he tsan dra ma te swAhA/ zla 'di blo gros ma'i sngags dang dkug pa'i spyan cen ma'i'o// oM tsan dra pad mI'i swAhA/ pad ma'i snying po ma'i
188a3(rgyud): dgas so//  thul na swA/ kr-in mdzes pa'i sngags s+ho// T+Tadzarba tA swA b+h+yaH/ lag padang lag ming ma'i rdzogs sa// mi hU~M ga nyi na tiH/ sman chen ma'i sngags so//

188a5(rgyud): sngags so// d+hI pA li me li ka mI ka ha mid+d+haM bi ki lI ka li swAt+ma/ sngon ma phreng ba ma'i sngags so// ka ma sa b+hi sa bi ni swAhA/ 'dod pa'i phreng ba sro'i sngags so// sir+b+ba d+ha li bsnanas bum

188a7(rgyud): su d+hA ra saM ni ka mA~M na~M swAhA/ stu mdzes ma'i sngags so// ma hi s+yai b+ha ya ka ri swAhA/ rdzu 'phrul chen mo'i sngags so// gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi'o// in dre ye de bA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ dang
188a8(rgyud): 'i snying po'o// sa ga ni ye mur b+hU d+hi pa ta ye swAt+ma/ me m+b+ha'i snying po'o// e ma sa~M pra hA d+h+ye ba ta ye swAng+ge/ gshin rje'i stong ba no// ni ra d+ha ya rat+na swa d+hi pa ta ya~M swAhA/ bdon thal / 
188b1(rgyud): skyeng po'o// ba du Na yang lA sa te pa tA ye swAhA/ chu bdag gi sring pa'o// 'alab san ta dak+Sha a te pa tamA swAt+ma/ rlung lha'i snying po'o// zhu ber d+ha na satwAM pA ta ye sAtra/ lus ngan gyi skang
188b2(rgyud): pa'o// sI shA nA pa b+hU t+yA sa te pa ta ye swAt+ma/ dbang sanAH skyed bya'o// myuraHthas+thAn s+thAH/ tshangs pa'o d+hA'aM/ ad+b+ha'id+b+ha bek+ShahUM/ !2'jug gi b+h+ri po li/ eSh+Tabar taka
188b3(rgyud): swAhA/ rdo rje'i snying po'o// hA tA sa nA yA swA hA/ shag ti'i snying po'o// ma d+hi s+yam+b+ha ya~M swA hUM/ dbyug pa'i snying po'o// khang+ga bi ma swa b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ ram gri'i snying po'o// da ru NA ta mA /

188b5(rgyud): pa'i snying po'o// b+hi la sha b+hI hu le swA hA/ phyogs kyi sngags so// sha re d+ha ya swAd+ha/ mda'i dra ba'i sngags so// a yurad+hidzaM pa badz+ra pAn tsa rA ya swA hA/ rdo rje

188b7(rgyud): bar ni brjod// skye ba gang rnams dngos grub 'dod// de rnams dbang bskur don du bya// brgyan pa'i don du rab tu 'bad// radi ltar dkyil 'khor chen por bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin dbang

189b2(rgyud): para'agyur ro// 'di'i sngags ni/ na mo rAt+na tra lA ya/ da mo maNi b+ha dA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha senA pa ta ye/ oM nga ma b+ha la nga len drA ya swAhA/ sngags 'di dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya yis gnas rnam pa sngar hA/

191a5(rgyud): de shAn d+ha kar da kar na to shes mabyin b+h+ya!/  sa 'i b+ha/ rtenye bar bstan pa ni/ yang lag pa gnyis pan tshun du mngon par phyogs nas gci tu sbyar zhing dang du smras nas mthe slong

191b8(rgyud): mas thams cad byas la/ bo de tse thugs kyi sdud pa yongs su bkung la gnod gnas dang 'dra bar rang ba sgoms bzhi mo yi ni spyi bor dgod par bya// dzaM yis kha ru nges par dgod/ 
192a1(rgyud): b+ha yig lag pa g.yas par dkod// lA yig g.yon par dgod par bya// dza yig snying gar dgod pa'o// brla ni g.yas dang g.yon pa la// len tra nges par dgod par bya// / 
192a2(rgyud): yig mtshan mar dgod par bya// de nas blo dang ldan pa yis/ rkang pa'i mthil du swA hA dgod// 'di rnams gnod sbyin dbang po rgyal// gsang ba'i snying por rab tu grags// 'di na
192a3(rgyud): gang shes blo ldan yin// de las dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar nus par bzlas pa bya// bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas ni// sems can rnams la bsod nams gang // mnyam par/ 
192a4(rgyud): gzhag pas dbul bar bya// ji ltar 'dod byas blangs nas ni// de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya// sngar gyi spyan drang phyag rgya las// mtheb mo brkyang bas bskyod pa'o// sngags dang ldan
192a5(rgyud): pas gshegs su gsol// sngags ni/ l-i Di ke twe rag ta adz+nyA swAhA/ rim pa sarlom sa sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas sa phyinapa ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rnas/

192a7(rgyud): da ngo mtshar ro// bde bar gshegs pa shin du ngosatshar ro// sems can thams cad khyad par slob dang / don thams cad sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po'i 'dag nyid can sems can gang
192a8(rgyud): gis gnod gnas kyi dbang po'i rtog pa mnyan 'dod pa'i don ma lus bsgrub pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan// 
192b1(rgyud): pa'i la kho la gzigs nas/ gnod gnas chu rtag pa 'di gsungs pa sngar brjod pa'i tshogs sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ de nas yang gnod gnas kyi dbang po la dri dang me tog gi mchod pa byas

192b3(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis pus mi nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas

193a1(rgyud): dang bca' ba yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// bya ngan med kyi me tog sa zho dang mar dang skad rtses thugs te dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na gang gsol pa btab pa de

198a6(rgyud): khal nA sa d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
198a7(rgyud): ra/ bcom ldan 'das shA kya'i yul ser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sdu gcan po na myal na nyal ba las/ srin po zhig gis spangs par
198a8(rgyud): 'gyur to// de nas gzhon du sgrag can rin de nyid kyi mtshan ma 'das nas gzhon du mang po rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te/ ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas/ bcos ldan
198b1(rgyud): 'das gal bad sang po byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das sde zhabs lamag pas phyag 'tshal te/ sman sngar 'dug nas dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bol bka' stsal
198b2(rgyud): gla can zin bsrung ba'i phyir me kha la zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bshad kyis khyod kyis zungs shig/ lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / srid
198b3(rgyud): tshogs dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang / sha na'i tshogs dang / yi dgas kyi tshogs dang / grul bum
198b4(rgyud): tshogs dang / srul po'i tshogs dang / gza'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpor nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drang srong 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams
198b5(rgyud): dang / gangs la gnas pa dang / phyogs bcu na 'byung po gang dag 'khod pa dang / srin mo'i tshogs dang / bA li dang / kA Ta li de dang / bong
198b6(rgyud): mo'i tshogs rnams ngal nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi bsrungs ma shar phyogs kyi phyogs can srin mo breg ma zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs kyi phyogs chen srin mo grang sngam shes bya ba dang / 
198b7(rgyud): 'phyogs kyi phyogs cha na srin mo la pa can zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo sa'i gtsug ces bya ste/ srin mo drag mo de dgra re re yang 'khor bye ba drug cus bskor ba me khA
198b8(rgyud): rig sngags las brjod pa de thams cad kyis bsrung bar gyis shi ka/ tad+ya thA/ g+ha ne k+Sha ne k+Sha re g+ha ne/ g+ha d+hene/ kun d+han pa ti/ b+h+ra me g+hu me/ g+ha se ny+tsa me/ b+hU me b+hU ba~M/ kU be+e b+h+ra me pa ti/ 
199a1(rgyud): nAr/ kA re b+ha re/ g+ha k+sha ri ni/ b+ha ra ba ti sa ra ba ti/ d+ha na ba ti/ swa rab te/ a hi/ me ba ti ma ti/ a pa ti swa ba ti/ bo hA ba ti/ ha la ha la/ ha la hA la/ hA la hA la ha la/ he'i hi'i/

204b3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud thams cad mkhyen byal phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin bdag po ma skyong ga ga 'i// buM gis rjes kyi gcig yid kyi bzhugs pa la// dpung babang rtul bzhin rgas par phyaga'
204b4(rgyud): mi rnams bzlas brjod dang // srang dang yang dag sdom pa mi bzad pas// rab tu 'asgrims kyang thub pam mtho
204b5(rgyud): na// ya ba gcig ci srad dka' thub don ma mchis// gtso bo ga'i brjid nyi 'od me lta bu// khyod kyis sreg 'jams dag byed rnams kyi mchog/ bden pa'i gsungs gisnga ra tu bka' du
204b6(rgyud): / ci ltar sngags rnams 'bras bu ma mchis 'grapa// rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin pa sa rnams// bsgrubs kyang gsung sngags 'bras bum stsal la// bsnyen pas ni cung ba
204b7(rgyud): dan// Arje pa nyon mongs kho nI tsi rung lags// rgyal ba sa ye shes zhi ba gang yin pa// de yi pa 'di dag gso byar sngon gapung ldan// gang la sdigs dang rig pa thub med pa// de dag
204b8(rgyud): // thugs rje ldan pas 'grol spyan kya dang // khyod ces gas grags sna tshogs bshad pa'i rnams// de dge bzlas badzad sbyin grag
205a1(rgyud): / zhugs dang // bsnyen la sogs pas ma grub ci las gyur// cho ga nyams sam 'on te mnyam mchis// dus kyi rang bzhin lags sam sdig byas bsgribs// gsang sngags
205a2(rgyud): gzhan du gyur ta ma 'tshal las gyur// thams cad ma lus bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// pus lnga tshig de nges par gastan gyur nas// bud tsam dgongs nas dkyus ring spyan gyi
205a3(rgyud): phyag gis rdo rje me stag zer 'brog// gsor nas rdo rje can gyis 'di skad gsungs// e ma'i zla ba'i 'od ltar lham me ba'i// snying rjes sems can pan phyir khyod 'dri ba// shin tu
205a4(rgyud): pa med pa'i sems 'di yis// bde gshegs sras nang pha rol byin par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bde ma chags// rang
205a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal rnams kyis sdug bsngal te// de dgu de bas dga' dang ldan par gyur// bu khyod rang bzhin pa'ang po 'di lta bus// gang phyi sema'i ldan pan phyir khyod 'drig// da pyir gyur/ 
205a6(rgyud): gtsug yid byos dang // gas de sngag sa mdo sde'i tshul bzhin ngas bshad do// gsang sngags branas brjod gang dag ngas gsungs pa// de yi 'dul zhugs dang por ngas bshad
205a7(rgyud): do// dmis bde bar gshegs la dade bskyed nas// de bzhin du ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed// ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnam spangs te// dko ni mchog gsum la dad pas
205a8(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bya// rdo rje rigs shes brjod pa rgya chen dang // nga la yang ni da cing dga' bar bya// tshig rngu'i phra ma 'khyal pa smra ba dang / gzhan gyi bud med bgrod dang brdzun smra dang / 
205b1(rgyud): da dkuzhan gyi srog gtsad gnod byed dadu// mang dang bye ba rtag tu spang bar bya// tshangs pa gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni// de bzhin yid kyis bsod rnams bsngags byas kyang // rnam
205b2(rgyud): cad log bAr stabs bcom pa sA na// de yi rnam smin mi 'dod 'bras bur gyur// dper na sa dang chu dang dum ldan rang // sa bon tshig pa myu gu mi bskyed ltar// de bzhin mi shes log lta
205b3(rgyud): bcom pa yi// sems la dge ba'i chos rnams mo skye'o// dbyer log par lta ba rnam spangs la// yang dge lta ba la ni bsten par gyis// rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gi// chos
205b4(rgyud): lam la gnas par byas na legs// lha dang lha min sha za khrag 'thung ba// mtshan mo rgyu ba mi bzad 'jig rten na// sems can rnams la gnod pa byed cing rgyu// bzlas brjod brtson pa
205b5(rgyud): sems ni g.yeng bar byed// de dag rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir// nga yi gsang sngags rig pa'i tshogs mthong na// sgrub par byed do snyam du dogs skyes pa// de phyir zlos pa'i sems
205b6(rgyud): de g.yeng bar byed// de ltar gnad byed de dag gzhom pa dang // bdag nyid 'byor par bya byar ngas gsungs pa'i// dkyil ladzer lha dang lha min gi nas gyur pa// dam tshig ci bzhin bco// 
205b7(rgyud): rnams don du blta// sna tshogs pa yi gdon rnams gnas pa la// gang zhig rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor der ni gnod byed gzhom pa'i phyir// mi yis rab tu bsgri
205b8(rgyud): nas 'dug par bya// kang yang rig pa mchog tu gsungs pa dang // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du yang 'jug par bya// der ni dam tshig sna tshogs ngas bshad pa// sdig pa bsam gyi
206a1(rgyud): tu blta bar bya// rdo rje rigs gtso pho nya mo yi tshogs// rig pa mang pos bstan pa'i lha mo de// zlos pa mthong na bgegs rnams phung ba dang // rngam par thon zhing
206a2(rgyud): tu phrag par 'gyur// ci lta ci ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang // de lta de ltar rdo rje rigs bsten dang // reg pa'i tshogs la bsten pa'i bsod nams kyis// de yi lus lam lus byin
206a3(rgyud): rlabs 'jug/ mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid de mthong dang // sa phyogs rdo rje'i me 'bar de shes nas// lha kru g+ha min gnod sbyin grub pa'i rnams// bzlas brjod byed pas skrag nas
206a4(rgyud): ra 'gyur// nga yi dam tshig mthong ba'i bu dag gis// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pas bshad pa yi// gsang sngags
206a5(rgyud): cad brlag par byed par 'gyur// rig dang dam tshig mtho ba skyed rje med// de bzhin byang chub sems ni ma bskyed cing // sangs rgyas ma dang lha gzhan la brten pas// nga yi gsangs
206a6(rgyud): zlas na phung bar 'gyur// bsam pa zhan cing nyams kyis mi lcogs pas// dkyil 'khor de kun blta bar mi nus na'ang // de las gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gcig tsam
206a7(rgyud): kyang dad pas mthong gyur na// gnod sbyin tshogs dang mtshan mo rga ba dang // sa d+ma'i gdon rnams kun dang klu bdag dang // lha la sogs dang bgegs drang log 'dren rnams// brtul
206a8(rgyud): nugs gnas pa de la glags milta// dper na lo tog thams cad sa dgal// brten nas skyon med par ni bye ba ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims brten nas chos dkar mchog
206b1(rgyud): 'i chus brlan pas ni rnam par skye// rgyal ba ngas gsungs so so bar pa yis// tshul khrims rnam dag 'dul ba ma gus las// sngags pa khyim pas rtags dang cho ga spang // lhag ma rnams ni
206b2(rgyud): nyams su blang bar bya// de ltar zlog pa'i chos las rnam grol nas// badre bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos// dag cing grol ba dang ni ldan 'gyur ba'o// bzlas pas
206b3(rgyud): sgron mdo sde bklag par bya// gtsang zhing dben pas yi phyogs su ni// 'jim pa 'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i// bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can// sdig pa sbyang ba'i
206b4(rgyud): rtag tu gdab// ring bsrel can gyi sku gzugs mchod rten la// bstod cing phreng ba dri dang mar me dbul// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan rol mo dang // mchog tu dad pa yis ni ma
206b5(rgyud): par bya// nam yang 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta ni// rta dang ldan yang lam du mi 'gro ltar// de bzhin bsgrub pa yi ni grogs med na// lus can dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ni
206b6(rgyud): ldan gzugs babang gtsang sbra che// rigs ni btsun zhing ches la gzhol ba dang // spobs pa che zhing dpa' la dbang po dul// snyan par smra zhing sbyin phod snying rje can// bkres dang
206b7(rgyud): ba dang nyon mongs bzod pa dang // bram ze dag dang lha gzhan mchod mi byed// sbyin zhing bzol byas pa gzo ba dang // dkon mchog gsum la dad pa grogs po yin// de lta'i yon
206b8(rgyud): ti ma thus ldan pa dag/ cod pa'i dus na shin tu dkon pa sa na// yon tan byed dang bzhi cha'am brgyad ma can// de lta bu dag sngags pa'i grogs por bsten// 'phag / 
207a1(rgyud): bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u dang po'o// // rang sangs rgyas dang bde gshegs nyid skyes dang // rgyal ba sngon chad gang na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i// gnas gang bsod
207a2(rgyud): rnams ldan zhing yid dga' ba// lha dang / min sogs pas phyag 'tshal mchod// gso sbyong sdom pa dag dang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid dag par b+ha phyir bsnyen pa bya// da lta bu dag
207a3(rgyud): zhan yang ni// chu bo chu klung 'bab tu mod pa dang // pad ma ud pa las ni brgyan pa'i mtsho// skye bo rnams kyang shin tu mi r+g+ha ga// dang zhing shes pa'i chu ni mang ba dang // mi bzang gdon
207a4(rgyud): dkrigs pa dang // sa steng gnas ma la shin tu gtsang ba dang // gang na stag ga
207a5(rgyud): med pa dang // yid 'ong mnyam zhing tsher ma med pa dag/ mi yi dngas grub gnas su bsgrags pa yin// grog po grog mkhar thal ba sgra shad dang // nyal nyil sol ba tshana'am chog
207a6(rgyud): // der nis brkos sbyangs nas gnas brtsigs pa// drol brtan gang 'jam pas zhal zhal bya// shar ram byung ngam nub du sgo btod cing // lho phyogs su ni nam yang sgom btod/ 
207a7(rgyud): gtsang khang pa de yi phyogs gcig tu// rgyal ba lam mchog rnam par ston pa yi// ras kyi sku gzugs las phyir brtan par gdags// yang na shing gzugs legs pa mchod
207a8(rgyud): ka/ tha ga pas btags 'jam la snyoms pa dang // thags bzang de bzhin skra shad med pa dang // lo lag che zhing ma nyams kha tshar bcas// ras kyi gzugs de mi la da
207b1(rgyud): grub ster// gtsang ma spos chus btab pa de la ni// mtshon rtsi sbyin med snod gsar thugs pa yis// khrus byas gtsang la gso sbyong gzung ba'i mi// mkhas pas ba lang spu yis bri bar bya// 
207b2(rgyud): gleng ba bdug spos mar me lha bshos dang // byug pa dag gis klu gzugs cher mchad de// nub phyogs zhal bstan mi g.yo brtan par gdags// de yi sman sngar dngos grub brtsam par/ 
207b3(rgyud): // gtsug phrad bzhag ste sgra ni bregs nas su// 'byung khung chen gyis gos kyi kha dog bskur// gos dkar dag gam shing la'am gsom 'am// ba ma 'am shing shun rnams kyig/ 
207b4(rgyud): ma pa dang // ma chags zlum zhing mags rma med pa// yid du 'ong ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar
207b5(rgyud): ha cang mi nye ha cang mi ring la// bza' btung mod cing dmangs rags mang ba dang // 'gron la mchod byed legs par gnas pa'i grong // bram ze phyi rol skye bo med par brten// nga rgyal
207b6(rgyud): non pa'i bram ze rnams// rigs kyis rlom zhing snying rje mi ldan pa// de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// mchod pa mthong nas gegs kyang byed par 'gyur// bram zes sa
207b7(rgyud): pal ci ltar dman// glang las bram ze dag la dmangs rigs rnams// bsnyen bkur dang ni mchod par 'gyur bas na// dmangs rigs kyis kyang gsang sngags ci ltar bzlas// lha dang
207b8(rgyud): 'gron mchod pa dang las drug dang // rgyal po dang ni me lha bsten pa dang // bu yi don du 'gro bar bya ba dag/ bram ze rnams kyi nges par grub pa yin// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs rnams kyang // 
208a1(rgyud): rang gi las// grub pas 'di la the tshom ma byed ces// brdzun du sra ba sna tshogs skyon dag gis// bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ni sreg par byed// lan lag brgyad lam
208a2(rgyud): gnas pas rtag tu ni// nyi ma byed 'tshams tshun tshad bslang bar bya// bla ma'i 'dus ni kyi dro yon pas nA// de phyir bram ze'i khyim du 'gro mi bya// dge dang me dge shes pa 'azung na ni/ 
208a3(rgyud): ma ze dmangs rigs dag la khyad par med// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i blos ni bram ze dang // 'di ni dmangs rigs yin zhes brtags par bad// bden pa'i lam dmigs dge ba'i rjes
208a4(rgyud): 'brang na// dmangs rigs dag kyang skye shi med par 'gro// log pa'i lam zhugs nyes par spyod ldan na// bram ze gang yin mi bzad dmyal bar
208a5(rgyud): pa dag/ 'di na gzhan gyis dag par mi 'gyur te// de ni sdig pa rnam par bsal ba dang // bsod napas ma lus yongs su bzung ba sa 'dag/ dper na ma ni gso dang bsal ba'i
208a6(rgyud): nadra pa dag la sman ni sbyin pa ltar// de bzhin 'dir yang bkres pa'i sdug bsngal dka/ bsal phyir rgyal bas khams bza' bar gsungs// la la lam gyis dub cing 'gro ba'i tshe/ 
208a7(rgyud): bkres skom gdungs pos rang gi bu yi sha/ za ba bzhin du rnal 'byor sems dman bzhin// cha dang rgyags byiphyir bza' bar mi bya'o// mang du thugs na col med mtho ba dang // de
208a8(rgyud): nyudub srang ni dma' gyur la// ngan pas skad ceg mnyam par 'gro ba ltar// lus can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya// dper ra khang rnying mi zhig bya ba'i phyir// mi yis ka ba brtan pa
208b1(rgyud): btsugs pa ltar// de bzhin lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang // shing rta'i mig bsku bzhin du kha bas bza'// 'dod pa'i khams ni khabs kyis gnas shes// rgyal bas chos gcig tu/ 
208b2(rgyud): ni bka' stsal pas// lus ni chu shing bzhin du rig byas te// sems ni bza' btung tshogs la chags mi bya// dbang po drug po yul la 'phro ba dag/ bde gshegs gsungs pa'i shes
208b3(rgyud): pas bsrung bar bya// lhung babod de dag las ni gcig thogs nas// gnya' shing gang du lta zhing bsod snyoms spyad// 'dzum zhing 'gro la sla zhing bur mig can// yan lag thams cad
208b4(rgyud): med 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs// bud med gzugs ni mtshon cha 'jebs 'dra bas// skyes pa'i sems ni mngon du 'phrog par byed// lcags kyi thong lcags rab tu 'bar ba yis// mig/ 
208b5(rgyud): dri rnam par bkab pa ches sla yi// nyis na dran pa nyams byed bud med kyi// dkyus ring mig can bzhin ni ma mthong sa// gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing 'dzin med // sems kyis sem/ 
208b6(rgyud): rnam par 'dul bzhin du// rab dang 'bring la sogs pa thang pa nas su// mi smra bar ni gzhan gyi kyis du 'gro// gang na ba bzhon be'u brag chung ba dang // gang na skyes bu chang ni 'thung ba
208b7(rgyud): dang // ga na bu mo gzhon bsten rtse ba dang // de bzhin gang na gzhon nu rje ba dang // gang na khyi za dga' ston byed pa dang // gang na skye bo mang po 'dus pa dang // de bzhin gang na rol mo byed pa
208b8(rgyud): rnams// de na gyis phun ma yang 'gros bya// bsod snyomapa po snyed phyir te 'ongs nas kyang // dang por ci ltar bde bar bgo bar bya// rkang 'grus blo bur ba la byin nasas// lus bsgru/ 
209a1(rgyud): phyir ni kha zas bza' bar bya// dus su bos nas dus gsum khas byas te// phreng ba mar ma bdug pa bstod dang dri// sha chad med pa'i lha ba shos phul nas su// ku sha'i
209a2(rgyud): khres la 'dug nas bzlas brjod bya// bdug pa byug spos la sogs mi rnyed na// dri zhem me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya// swab a rma bil bapri ha ti// ku sha dri ngan yid du mi 'ong spang / 'gre
209a3(rgyud): ngam 'dug gam ma ldog nyal ba dang // 'gro 'phres pa klog bzlas brjod byed pa na// rjes su dran drug so so'i yon tan dag/ rig par bcas te rjes su dran par bya// 'phags pa dpung // 
209a4(rgyud): zla 'dra ba'i// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar ni yongs su bsngags// dper nA dri med chu ni rdul tshogs kyis// skad cig du yang rnyog par byed pa ltar// de bzhin rnam dag dri ma med pa'i/ 
209a5(rgyud): sems// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis rnyogs par 'gyur// pu tri dzi dang dung shel ru rag sha/ lung tang pad mA'i snying po na nye zangs// khar ba'i bgrang phreng brgya ni rdza brgyad
209a6(rgyud): ba// de dag las ni bgrang phreng gcig blangs te// de ni lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba'am// lag pa g.yon pas bsgrims te mi 'khrul bzung // tsha rA re phyin cing nor
209a7(rgyud): sngags pa yis ni rim bzhin drang bar bya// 'dug nas dbang po yang dag bsdam pa dang // lus kyang drang zhing brtan par bzhag nas su// phyis ni ma mchu shin tu mdzes par/ 
209b1(rgyud): yang // bskul zhing gsang sngags ci dgar bzlas brjod bya// sems ni klog dang sprin dang rlung dang mtshungs// rgya mtsho chen pa yi ni rlabs dang 'dra// sgra can 'dod dgur yul la mngon dga'
209b2(rgyud): gla/ g.yo zhing 'phyan pa nges par 'dul bar bya// gang mthos pa'i sems ni ni ba la// bsten pas gnyid kyis dran pa rmongs gyu na// langs rnaMs bcag cing phyogs su blta ba dang/ 
209b3(rgyud): yis gdong yang yongs su bkru bar bya// las kyi dbang gyur bdag po med pa dang // mgon med skyabs med tshe rabs cig nas gcig/ lus kyi kha brgyud rjes su rab 'gro ba// de yi rjes
209b4(rgyud): su dge dang mi dge 'aglang // tshol dang mdza' bshes dang ni rnam par bral// mi sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs// ngan pa skye rgan 'chi'i sdug bsngal can// yul rnams kun du
209b5(rgyud): song na'ang med pa min// sha spang tsha brang bkres dang ngal la sogs// gang du sing yang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas// yul lnga mngon dga'i sems ni 'byung ba na// rnam rtog de dag rnams
209b6(rgyud): brog par bya// 'dod chags shas che mi gtsang sha tshil dang // pakrus pa keng rus lta bas rnam par bzlog// byams drang snying rje'i chus gang bzhe sdang la// gti mug lnga ni rten 'brel lam
209b7(rgyud): ces so// re shig gcig na dgra yang mdza' bor 'gyur// mdza' bo dag kyang dgrar ni 'gyur ba nyid// de bzhin kha cig kyang ni bar mar 'gyur// bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra bor 'gyur// de
209b8(rgyud): mnga' bshes 'gyur bar rig bya ste// blo gros ldan pas nam yang chags mi bya// gnyen la dga' ba'i sems kyi rtog pa dag/ bzlog nas dgel ci bder bzhag par bya// dang po bzlas na la
210a1(rgyud): brjod zin pa dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs zhing pa dang // bud med ma ning khye'u bu mo dang // sngags 'chang nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// ci sde dgos pa yod na sngags g.yog dang // 
210a2(rgyud): 'ad 'i lta nga 'dres par /  nas srid pa 'asha gtsa na rgya / na du zhug nas thas /  das ma ba dag 'tsham
210a3(rgyud): dga' grub byas pa'o// dag pa de kun blan med pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub tha med mchog tu bsngo// dper na chu klung rgya mtshor phyin pa na// lan nI'i rod ni gcig tu tur ba bzhin// de ltar bla med
210a4(rgyud): chub bsngos pa yis// bsod nams rgyal ba'i ngor ni gcig tu 'gyur// dpe
210a5(rgyud): / sog ma'i phung ston la 'byung ba bzhin// de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir// bsod nams bsgrub kyi longs sud phyir min yang // sog ma'i phung po dag dang mtshungs par ni// 
210a6(rgyud): khrims bzhin du mi yi mang po spyod 'phrug/ rje ring ba 'di logs par 'thob pa dang // chos bzhin nub pa'i sal dag rnye ba'im// sgob med par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba ste// bsam pa rnamapa ni
210a7(rgyud): rtag tu rdzogs par bya// grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bstod sang dag/ sems kyis 'jig rten chos rnams rab bcom ste// sdig pa'i gnas su gyur
210a8(rgyud): spang bar bya// dper na rgya mtsho skad cig tsam yang ni// mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar// de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa// sngags pas skad cig tsam yang gnas mi bya// 
210b1(rgyud): rlung med 'ang ba'i nang du ni// mar me btsugs pa mi g.yo' bar bltar// rtse gcig sems kyis zos la mngon dga' ba'i// lum la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar bar gyur// stangs dang mchod / 
210b2(rgyud): TI kar byed dang // glu len du bdud skye bos dpya gyur dang // lhag pa'i ngargya la 'drid dang 'dod rten dang // brgyan stod ni 'dus la lta 'dod dang // dus min gnyid dang mi 'grub smra ba dang // bstan
210b3(rgyud): bcom ngan dang snyad du gis klog 'din dang // chags dang 'tshig dang dregs dang chags pa dang // zhel 'dzin dang le lo gso sgyu srang // sha cang ke'u dang btsod dang srog rdog dang // 'bru mar til dang
210b4(rgyud): bsu ngan// 'byung po'i zas dang lha ba shos gtor ma dang // gu lang mchod byas gtor ma mi ba pa'o// ngas ni sngags pa kha zas dkar
210b5(rgyud): dang 'o ma mar dag dang // 'bru mar tshogs ma dang bu 'ol kon dang // thug pa rnams ni bza' btang yin par gsungs// sha ba srin po dag dang gnon po dang // ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa sgrub pa/ 
210b6(rgyud): dang // g+ha min bu mo'i 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa'i tshe// 'bru mar tshogs ma'i bza' ba mchog du bsngags// de ltar bzlas brjod byed pa'i sgrub pa pos// nyin gcig bzhin du byas nas 'arlas
210b7(rgyud): pani// dul nas chog bzhin du gshegs su gsol// nub mo ku sha ba ting nas nyal bar bya// byams pa snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms ldan po dang // bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun 'acas pa/ 
210b8(rgyud): byas te// shA ri'i bu dang nga la thal sbyar btud nas nya la// de ltar bsngags pa sdig pa mtha' dag zad par bya// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'o// / sgrub pa po yis
211a1(rgyud): // nges par bcang ba yi// rdo rje de dag gang yin bshad par bya// sar bcwa bcu gnyis bcu drug bcwa brgyad dang // mchog ga chad ni sor yang nyi shu pa'o// gser gyi rdo rje ngag 'dzin nyid
211a2(rgyud): nes rnams thob par bya phyer rab tu shis// rgyal po'i don du dngul gyis mchog yin te// zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i klu baphru ba la// lha min dbang po'i 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang // phyag
211a3(rgyud): du 'byol rdo yi rdo rje'o// don kun bslab pa la ni lcags gsum gyi// gsang ba'i sde gzhom pa la lcags kyu'o// de ni gzhan yi ni sring ldeng dpal dang tshe// nad mod nor rdzas la nI bil ba'o// 
211a4(rgyud): byas po mig 'khrub chen po la// dbye phyir nim pa las byas rab tu shis// gsad cing bskum pa la ni ba ru'i shing // sha za bsgrub pa pa yang rab tu shis// lha dang gnod sbyin dri za
211a5(rgyud): bsgrub pa la// sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje'o// ci ste ku ni dbang du byed 'dod na// de tshe klu shing rtsa ba las byas pa'o// gzugs bsgyur ba las las byas pa ste// r-i langs
211a6(rgyud): bsgrub pa la ni ka tam pa'i// punA da kA dang rA dza Arka dang // a sh+tsad shing gi rdo rje nor gyi phyir// b+hA ba A pra shri bar rna ba yI// ardzu la sogs pa las byas pa dag/ mi rnams
211a7(rgyud): bya'i phyir// tsan dan dkar po dang ni dmar po ste// dbyibs legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'i//

211b2(rgyud): ra mi 'gyur ro// de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na// khu tshur bcangs nas rtse gcig sems kyis 'bras// 
211b3(rgyud): ngos gi ru lang ra khre sa ldan// spangs ma pa'al zhags pas gri bcag/ mar dang shu dag 'khor la rdo rje mdung // pabs pa ga tshe mdung ni rtse gsum pa// dzas ni bcu bdun pa

211b7(rgyud): 'phros pa mtha' yas so// sa smyer 'jig rten skyong bzhi gang yin pa// de dag g.yog 'khor mya dran med pa yin// de yi g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag bdun rnams// de dag gsang sngags
