224a3(rgyud): ba brgyad po 'di yi dus dag tu// gnas 'di gang yang rung pazhig tu bsten// mtsho dang shing dang ri bo'im dgon pa'i gnas// mche'u dade khang pa gnas sam chu ngogs su/ kun dpyid zla ba rnams la gnas
224a4(rgyud): nas// sngags pas dbyar ni gcig tu gnas byas te// ci ltar rgyal bas dag slo kyar phrag yug/ tshul bzhugs gnas gzhan mi 'gror gsungs pa bzhin// de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags pa
224a5(rgyud): zla ba gsum du gcig tu gnas par gagadus// sngags pas dbyar ni bsgrub la mi 'jug par// khazlas brjod kyis ni dus kyang 'das par bya// dbyar 'das dang ni gsang sngags gzi bskyed pas// bdag
224a6(rgyud): ba.ung byas bsgrub la 'dzag par bya// mtha' zlum po gru gsum gru bzhi dang // pad ma lta bur bya zhing dbyibs legs shing // 'jam zhing shing tu mnyam par byas nas su// de dag sa dang lci bas legs
224a7(rgyud): / zlul po dbang dang bskyed dang derang krug dang // spyan dang ni ba'i chog bla bar shis// mug sum dun dgar bskrad bsad dpa dang // gshed byed la sogs drag po'i mas kya bya// gru bzhi par rimis
224a8(rgyud): rab pe'i// srog bskam pa 'am yan lag gnag par bya// pad ma'i dkyings su bud med bu mo'i grong // yul 'khor 'thob pa'amangon kun bsgrub par shes// me tha ba lci ba gcang mal
224b1(rgyud): na kyang // gsag to/  na tham par bya// da mchog gsus dngaphyag rdo rje dang // yum la'ang dad pas grang ba 'dug pa dang // dra dang ma nyams ma tog ci snyed pas// tshan bzhin du lags par
224b2(rgyud): par bya// lam shing mang po thob kyi dru lags// rlung yab kyis ni me yang sar byas nas// sangs rgyas rnams la phyag rgyas thob ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas ma nyams pad ma'am// ma gugs ti la nag
224b3(rgyud): dadam brkyang // bcu 'am nyi shur sreg thugs me la bsreg/ ku sha bting ngam khres sam rtsa stan la// 'dug nas shar phyogs kha bstan rdzas rnams ni// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma la brtags nas// rang gis

224b6(rgyud): nye sa'i 'od zer 'dra// dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs kyang 'dra// dngal be'u dang ni pad ma blags bzar 'dra// me l+ye tri ru lha rdo rje ral gri 'dra// yang na shing rta mchog dang rnga yab 'dra// rdza
224b7(rgyud): dang ni gling bu'i sgra// dub me lce dri zhim me skrag bzang // yang nam sbar bar na 'bar 'gyur na// de tsha dngas grub rgya chen thob par 'gyu re// dud pa che zhing me stag rgod pa dang // 'bar bar dka' shing chu dazung
224b8(rgyud): zad 'bar// ma lce rnam par chad cing gzi ma dang sa med// brtsub gnag smin dang pa la sha ya ma dag/ gsal shing 'dra zhing zhib ma'i gzugs kyang 'dra// phyugs kyi mgo 'dras yang rab tu rtsub/ 
225a1(rgyud): 'thabs sbyid theg na tshig/ mama' dring dang so gras mang paston// ma 'i mtshan ma 'di' bram tho banas kyang // stobs pa cha la ma byas sbyin sreg bya// byin pa dag dang mtshan 'ang spa ma

225a3(rgyud): ltar// de bzhin sngags kyang legs par ma bzlas na// 'bras bu med dam yang na zung bar 'gyur// mi ni tshul khrims gtsang sgrami ldan yang // gsang sngags sgra ni de la gnod mi mdzad// lga yil
225a4(rgyud): gyur pa gang yin rnams// mi yi klags mthong nas ni phung bar byed// bsgrub pa kun la dang po kho nar ni// lha bshos gtor ma phal cher dbul bar bya// sngags pa'i las grub nas kyang dus kun tu/

225b3(rgyud): gang ka nas dang // gang dag gling mchog rnams na gnas pa dang // lhun po ngur thod dag na gnas pa rnams// rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su// phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang //

225b5(rgyud): rnams la mchod pa bya// dbang bdag 'byung po'i bdag por bcas pa yis// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol// me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag dang // rlung dang lus ngan 'byung po gdon

226a3(rgyud): yin par bshad// kate 'ug can gyis sdig pa gcig byas kyang // phung po 'di la grub pa thob ma 'gyur// mchod rten pa jigs cing byang chub sems dpa' gsod// nyon mong ba zad pa'i ma ni sun 'byin

226a7(rgyud): 'khang bsregs kyang rung // mi yi yul na sdug pa 'di byas pa// dka' ba spyod par ldan yang grub mi thob// gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yi// bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung
226a8(rgyud): dag nyid ngan pas dmyal bar bcom par 'gyur// de na pa ni nas las kyi dbang gis yang // rig sa da mi yi nang du skye ba 'theb// 'di dgangs ni khyod la mdor ba shad do// gang zhig byang chub sems ni thang
226b1(rgyud): / tshangs pas 'jig rten ma rdzogs phyag byas na// dang shad la ma gar gyur nas su// dmigs sngags dngas grub nyams par byed// 'angag tshan mams na dang ba las// ma yi yul na bya ngachu pa sems
226b2(rgyud): thA a bas// de ni byin ca dang la min dpa/ 'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag byar rom// mes ni mngon par mthongs ldas pa'i// bslab pa mdza' dag blangs par gyur pa dang // sems can kun la mi 'ang/

226b8(rgyud): 'angol bu yis// kyi la sogs pas sems can gsod pa dang // bya rog la sogs gzeb kyis bcing byas na// 'di dang pha rol du yang grub mi thob// bdud dgra'i me tog rnyeng pa par ba rnams/ 
227a1(rgyud): / bams ma rje zug la gags me sa// 'gres pas gdus kyang dadag rnams la ni// phul ba'i lba/ bshos rnams kyang bza' mi bya// 'jigs kyang tshangs pa brgya byin kya' 'ja

227a3(rgyud): // de dag bskyod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas// sbyin pa byin te snying rje bskyed nas sbyin// 'dabar gshegs pa rnams kyis brten pa yi// gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o// rangs /

230a1(rgyud): rnams ga gyu na// slar yang zhus dang 'thor 'thung byas gnas so// de nas phyir yang bklas la 'dug par bya// gtsang sbal dang zlos dga' skang rje can// rtag tu len pa las ni logs

230a4(rgyud): dribral de srid par du bya// sos ka nags mi mched pa'i me lce yis// ma bstims bzhin du tshang tshir kun bsreg war// bzlas brjod ma la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar// brtson 'grus chen po'i me skyes
230a5(rgyud): rdeg pa sreg/ ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// gdungs na ga'i brjid mi bzod 'dra ba bzhin// tshul sems nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas 'dzod rje// gdungs na sdig pa'i ga kyang zad par 'gyur// mun nag
230a6(rgyud): gal mar me phyung ba yis// mun nag ma lus sel bar byed paltar// tshe rabs stong nas bsags pa'i sdig pa'i mun// bzlas brjod mar mes myur du sel bar byed// ci ste bzlas brjod pa ni sbyi
230a7(rgyud): / sreg gis// gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na// 'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'am// yang na chu 'gram bye ma la yang gad pa// des ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la// byas
230a8(rgyud): pa gang ma dadi ba kyi sa ma ni gsang 'gas sa bu mis 'di nyid du// ma 'tshas lags sngags 'bras bu 'apa/ 'grus kyi rtsa ba dang rgyal khrims te/  nas brtson 'grus dang
230b1(rgyud): 'od ba dang // rgyal ba la yang dang byang chub sems// gas krugs dang ni malam dpa'o// sa sbyang me bang yan lag bdud ldan pa// su med par skyed bu 'dul bar byed// de bzhin sngags pa'ang man lag 'di bdud dang / 
230b2(rgyud): ldan na dngos grub dam pa'ang bab par 'gyur// dang po bzlas brjod pa la cher byas nas su// de yi 'og tu 'dir ni sbyin log bya// skyon sreg dag gis gsang sngags mchog myur stsol// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang sbyi
230b3(rgyud): mdzad// gang gis dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol nas// gsang sngags mthu les bud med bzhug kyang ni// bud med ma yin gnod sbyin bu mo ste// de gzugs cha byad kyis ni sngags pa bstan// 'dod pa'i don phyir bsgrub pa
230b4(rgyud): yin de/ drang na'ang gnod sbyin bu mos sbyid par byed// de ni bud med de yi lus su yang / sgral nas mtshan mo 'dod pa bsnyen par byed// ci ltar mi dag 'dod phyir bud med lan bsten phyir ma yin ni zang 'gyur lta pa
230b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin po'am bran mo dag/ gsang sngags mthus bkug bsten par byed pa'o// gzhan gyis chung bar yid la bzhag nas su// gang zhig de la 'dod gdungs bsten byed pa// mi shes yid kyis gnan gyi chung ba la// 'dodapa
230b6(rgyud): spyad pas sdig pa mang po 'bog rgyal ba la dang gzhan la phan brtson pa'i/ zhwa klu lha mid gnod sbyid dri za dang / thub par bcas pa sngags bshad gang yin pa// de dag rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// de bzhin gsheg
230b7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' yis// ma 'ongs sems can bkon skyabs med rnams pa/ rab tu gzigs nas byin gyis brlab pa mdzad// de dag 'bras bu rab dang 'bring dang ni/ tha mar dbye bas rnam pa gsum du bsten
230b8(rgyud): bsal la 'gro dang bal gyi bu ga du 'juka/ 'dod gugazugs can mi snang rnam pa dang // gnod sbyin bu mo kyo dang cud kyis len/ mig 'phrul sgyum mtshan mo rgyub ste/ de dag mchog yin sring nis bdag go// khongs
231a1(rgyud): nga byed nga dkrug pa dang // dka dang bsrang ba dang na pas pa dang // khru la gdon gyis zin pags pa dang // gang yang 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i las// deni mkhas pas bran chags yin par bskyed/  bran
231a2(rgyud): ku dang gnod sbyin dang / khyim pa gdon gyis rin dang gang dag tu/ lus can rnams la ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag/ skor bar byed pa phra mo'i phran tshegs yin/ byab dang khu tshur thal lcag sgra drang dang / rna bar bzlas dang
231a3(rgyud): 'a dang bsrang ba dang / bsad dang bcing la sogs pas tshar bcad dang // khong dang rig pa'i gos dang sngags gos dang / dog pas bsnun dang rnam par bskyod pa dang / mig tu dug song ltar ni gzhug pa dang / 
231a4(rgyud): thugs dang khab cing skyug tu gzhug su zhes bung dang yan lag gzhig pa dang // thang gis 'gro ba dag kyang dgug pa dang // phyir yang bcing dang mnan par bya 'ad// rmongs dang byed dang dug rer gzhug pa dang / 
231a5(rgyud): ni gzhan la spo bar bya ba dang // lcags kyur ldan pas drang bar bya ba 'am// lus la zhen pa'i dug ni bslang ba dang // zas par baba' dang zos pa bcad pa dang // sa bcing ba dang pho nya btang ba dang // bskrad pa dang ni
231a6(rgyud): la bstan pa dang / dung dang rnga rnga'i sgras ni bslang ba ste/ rnam pa 'di dag dug gi rlung du bshad/ sa yi steng na sbrul ni brgyad cu dag/ gzhan la gnod par byed cing rnam par 'khyam/ de dag rnams las nyi
231a7(rgyud): des cam// kyil ba drug dang dug med bcug nyis dang / de bzhin su la ni wal bcugasus ste/ bram dru ga ti smin rigs de'i nas togs/ skal ba'i ma no dang sdig pa rgyad dang / rnam par dbyen pa
231a8(rgyud): tsham gcad drug 'byo / da mthong ba dag / ches tsu la pa'i dun kyang gtagang la bdug gis rgyud la mkhas pa yis// ba 'bring bas gsum dunam par shin drug ma
231b1(rgyud): swA ga dag na spangs pa'am 'bras / nas ma na pagasu yang sa sa rna bdun zu ta da ma
231b2(rgyud): ba'o// gang du mche ba gcig gis khrag phyung rjes/ de ni dug chung bas ni zin par bshad / gang du mche ba banyis kyis btabangs su// khrag dag blang bar gyur pa zos pa'o// gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad na/ de ni bcang bar gyur pa yin
231b3(rgyud): des bstan// gang du mche ba lani yis btab nas su// sbrul gyis lus ni zos pas srung ba de// btab nas bos pa yin zhes pa gad pa ste/ de ni sran rnams kyis kyang bzlog par dka'/ me yi rang bzhin gnad rnams 'dral ba'i du// 
231b4(rgyud): tshon dang me dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa dang // ji ltar sngags kyis rab tu ni 'gyur ba/ de ltar sman pas sbyang bas me nus so// che ltar me bung chen pos bung gi la// nges par 'phre la tu 'bab skad cig gis/ zhi bar gyur pa de zhin
231b5(rgyud): duka dag ni// me lung lta bur sngags kyis zhi bar byed// dug gi mthu stobs shes nas rab bsgrims nas// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin bzlas bsgrubs na ne// sbyor ba 'dis ni dug kyang 'phrog par byed// ba lang kun seng ge ci lta
231b6(rgyud): 8// du/ rgyan rdu la dang dogs med zhan ci chen lba ku ng+ga mir gdod sbyin grub pa dang // drin 'byung po mtshun dang gsang ba dang / yi dgas sha ba dang ni lus srul po// skyo byed mdangs 'phrog pa dang grib non dang // sa yi steng na

231b8(rgyud): den dang pa ba dang / dga' ni ma pa ma'ang dang/  sa rje zhes byed martan pa dag/ ga'anas kyis bya 'i ba dan kyang/ ti ma 'od pa 'am gyi ma kyang 'dod pas
232a1(rgyud): lus la 'a52// 'jog/ gsang sa pa ma na dag pa mchog// mthutshan mchog ster dza nga lcags kyu'am// gan yang nga ma dgas byung dag pa 'am// kha tho ba
232a2(rgyud): zab srong sogs pas ga go// ci ltar rig sngags 'dzed pa'i mi dgal// gdo rnams 'dzegs par gyur pa de ltar no// ma khan drung min pong kyar sum brtseg dag/ 'joms byed ga'i phrin nyi mams pa
232a3(rgyud): dang // chu ba dag ma yin lha mir rnams kyis mi// nor bdag ma yir gnod sbyin rgyal pos min// lhag ra mkha' ldeng bya yi rgyal po dang // sa bsrung bu zhon khyer 'jigs rnams kyis min// 'byung por
232a4(rgyud): dge ljags 'dir ni kun mthong dang // gdon gyis spyod pa ma lus shes nas su// phye nas gdon rnams dogs med btul nas ni// gdon gyis mi 'jigs slar yang tshugs mi 'gyur// rigs gsum 'phel
232a5(rgyud): dang srid gsum mthar phyin dang // nyes pa gsum spangs las gsum thugs chung dang // de yi sras dang de yi rjes 'gro ba'i// rtswa dang lha man sogs pas bshad pa'i sngags// bdag nyid chen po'i mun pa sel ba

236a3(rgyud): mtshan ma rab tu'abang de brtag/ de nas gzhan yang sadag ni// spang bar bya ba dadab tu bshad// zhag 'dun gyi ninapa sogs sa/ ji ltar rigs pas bzung byas te// 'dzad gyis ni bachog byas zhing // de nas
236a4(rgyud): rngu dbyung bar bya// zug rngu bcas pa'i sa gzhi ni// las byas pa dag 'grub mi 'gyur// zug rngu nyes pa rus pa dang // gyo mo dang ni thal ba dang // sdong dum dang ni tsher ma dag/ rab tu bsgrims te ma lus dbyung // 
236a5(rgyud): nas thobs bong ba dag/ bkrum nas zhi ba sor byas te bcag/ de nas pa yi gcin gyis ni// yang nas yang du kadang bya zhing // lag mthil lta bur mnyam byas shing // ba yi lci ba chur sbyangs nas// shar phyonas
236a6(rgyud): nas ni mgo btsugs te// blo dang ldan pas legs par byag/ de nas de la dbus su ni// khung du cung zhig brkos nas dang // 'bru rnams dang ni rin chen kun// sngags kyis btab ste gzhug par bya// de ltar
236a7(rgyud): sbyangs shing dbyig dag gi// dbyig dang ldan par byas nas ni// tho dang ldan pas ci rigs par// sa gzhi yongs su gzung bya ba// yang dag bsdams pas nag gsum na// las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags dang / 
236a8(rgyud): gang ga kyil 'khor gang yin pa// de dag gis ni yongs 'azung bya// gcig zhis dri yi chu yis ne// dngos lugs pa gtor byab ste// gcig shos kyi ni lag pa yis// sal brim gyi mngon par sngags/ tho yis/ 
236b1(rgyud): chags kya // nas yongs su// sa rdzu gas na ga zug/  tsha don nus nyas pa'i srung/ yang ma nas pan 'dun dgu zlas/ grong na rnams
236b2(rgyud): thos pasams nas// mnyam par gnag su mdud bapor// deras slo mas yongs bzung nas// las ma bshegs ni med par 'gyur// sa ni dkyil lathong ze'i tshe// do nu ba lta bu sta gon gnas// sos mnyis shar ci'i tshe// 
236b3(rgyud): sa phyogs kyi ne cha dag brtag/ de nas dkyis 'khor dgod pa dag/ yid kyis legs par yongs su brtag/ sngags rgyud dag las 'byung ba'i bas// bzang la gtsang zhing sdus bag can// rjes su 'thun neng yid 'ong ba// slob
236b4(rgyud): mang racas pas ran par bza'// de nas nub kar zhus byas shing // gtsang la gos ni dkar po 'gos// tha ma slob ma dang bcas par// dkyil 'khor drung du dong bar bya// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa gde ni// byi dor legs
236b5(rgyud): byas leg 'a khrugs la// khro ma chen po bzlas pa yid// sro chus bsang gtor byas pa la// dbus su sta gon gnas pa dag/ rigs rnams kyi ni snying po bzlas// dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis// las
236b6(rgyud): rnam sa thams cad sa ba bshad/ sa gzhi'i steng du thug spos gyis// dkyis 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni pa rigs sngags kyis/ lag pas zil nang lan bdun bzlas// de nas gtso bo
236b7(rgyud): rnam pa ne/ seng gis ping la bas pas nas su// byug spos ma tog la sogs pas// snying po sa ci na mchod par bya// zhwa ba shos dag kyang dbul par bya// bdug spos mngon par sngags pa 'ang dbur// de nas cam
236b8(rgyud): dpa ldang ba la// tshul mngon par sngags kyi zhing // des me tog gis gtor nas// cho ga 'arjer du bdug pas bdug/ sa zhes su ngas pa ra'am// a tha ba rim med ga/ ha cang mi sros mi phra ba le// song bangs su
237a1(rgyud): gnas dadun/  ma gas sa/ rlu pa gags rgyu chu du pas bdug/ log pas sa dang rkyen/ nga nga
237a2(rgyud): 'am// lang ma lan 'dun 'a bras brjod na/ bamarnams kyi grangs las ni// so shing la sogs sa log par bya// so shing mkho na 'a' ngarnams smras pa// sor togacig ni mgor byas nas// rtse monas ni btsal
237a3(rgyud): de nas mkhas pas gnas dang ni// bdag dang slob ma brtan bsrungs nas// lha rnams thams cad legs mchod de// dang bor bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir// mar las btags pa'i yam shing dang // ma dang stsang
237a4(rgyud): til dag dang // mar gyi sreg thugs sbyin sreg bya// 'bras chan nor sbyar sbyin sreg bya/ de ri 'og tu snying po ste// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni// zhi ba'i rigs sngags nyid kyis bya// de nas slob ma legs

237b4(rgyud): lugs la dgas// bsod nams 'dod pa'i sems can ni// chen po dang sa mdor gzung ngo // bde gshegs gsang sngags bsgrub pa la// don gnyer brtson pa'i slob ma ni// gzugs ngan yon tan mi ldan yang /

241b3(rgyud): thung bar gyur na ni// de na dngos grub med gyur gyis// de tshe brtsams par mi bya yi// yang na de ni de ba'i phyir// yam shing me ni 'bar bal// ba yi mar las brgya rtsa brgyad// ni ba'i phyir ni sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin gshegs

247b3(rgyud): de/ khang po chen po gnyis gnyis shig/ khyad par du de bzhag par bya// bum pa gcig ni bye gro yi// drung du mngon par gzhag par bya// mang po 'byor par ma gyur na// brgyad dam yang ra lon pa zhag go// nyung ngu rnam pa ni kyang
247b4(rgyud): 'du// pha rol dag tu dgod bya ste// sgo yi drung du gcig gzhag pa// de ni nges par bya dgos so// 'bras kyi bo mon srad se'u// nas dang bro dang til dang wa// 'bru rnams kun shes bya ba ni// las rnams kun pa

259b5(rgyud): 'khor dag ni bri bar bya// yon tan 'di dang mi ldan par// gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'dra byed pa// de ni mib zad sems dmyal srung // grob ma rnams kyang don med 'gyur// mu ge dang ni nad mang dang // ban pa dang ni 'tshe ba 'byung

265b1(rgyud): / ga klu ga/ das la dzad //  rgyud ma ma /  ga // ma chung dang // tho bgal lags byag brnyan paca/ 
265b2(rgyud): ni nas pa sna tshogs kyang // pha ros gnon pa slad du grags// pra ye yang ni lha 'di la// gsang sngags mang po gang gsungs pa// gam brjid che zheng khyad par 'phags// de kun pas rnams thams cad byed// rgyal dang
265b3(rgyud): pad ma'i rigs 'dir yang // 'di da rgyal pos 'i skos pa'i byer// dam pa yin pa sheng bya ste// 'di dang mtshungs pa gzhan med do// gsang sngags le ge nyung ngu dang // gang dag sA hA oM lda pa'ang// ni ba la
265b4(rgyud): thams cad ni// de yis de dag myur du byed// hUM dang bcas shing phaT dang bcas// gang dgar dang kan chags mang // gsang sngags de dag drag spyod la// mkhas pas kun tu
265b5(rgyud): sngags// don dang chanan 'ang ldan pas// rgyas pa'i las na 'ams cad la// legs par rab tu sbyar bar bya// gdon sogs dgapa las pa ni// mkhas pas po gas gas pas bya// gsang sngags gang dag dol las byed// 
265b6(rgyud): de dag de dang der sbyar ro// las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis// mog nib mo rgyas gsungs par// thog pa las dgang smos pa// de ni gtso ba yin par bstan// gling gzhi dbang du mdzadunas ni// gsang sngags gang dag
265b7(rgyud): gsungs gyur pas// de nyid de la gtso bor bsgyud// lhag ma gzhan du shes par bya// rigs dang rang bzhin mthu rnams dang // las kyang rnam par sbyang dang ni// rang gi yid dang mthun pa 'i sa// g.yang sngags lani bsten pa
265b8(rgyud): cha nyung rib par bye'am// de nas gzhan yang gsung dag la ga/ cho 'i bar 'dod pa'o// tho dpa byed pa ni nye dang // ngagad bstan pa de bgad de// yan lag thams cad pa chad dang
266a1(rgyud): // ldan// dpal ldan gtsug lag rnams pa mkhas// chos la gcig tu dga' ba dang // rang gi bsla ba la yang gnas// des la 'grogs na 'de ba dang // snying rje'i bdag nyid brtse ba can// tsho rigs bcunan
266a2(rgyud): nga rgyal med// bro ldan sgra mkhas bzod pa che// theg chen dod la zhugs pa dang // ba' ma 'don la skrag par mos// kha nam po chung ngu la'ang // 'degs pa / ning legs pa sdams pa// gsungs la sogs pa'i mdo sde rnam pa/ 
266a3(rgyud): bcis// gas gas spyod pa rtson pa dang // gtsug lagaman dag pazhes par ston// las rnams 'thung cang bathas 'dzad car// dkyil la por rnams kyi les la 'alas// sdug ci legs par med
266a4(rgyud): chen por 'dod cing 'jungs dang thal// dkyil 'khor ched po dag tu ni// bla mas tshul bzhin dbang bskur zhing // bla ma la ni lung thob pa// de ni slob dpon yin par bshad// de nyid kyi ni cho ga bzhin// dam tshig la sogs
266a5(rgyud): 'a // gsang sngags rnams kyi chog gas/ shid kyis ni bstan par rog/ dmam pasnyen pa'i ga'ang sngags san// com med par bgrub par 'gyum// ga' du de snyen 6// rnas 'dod pa
266a6(rgyud): / bu med// ji ltar dkon mchog gsum dag dang // rgyal ba'i sras la lta bltar// bros pas bla ma mthu chen la// da ltar lha zhing bkur sti bya// de ni kun 'a khrul par byed// skyabs la sogs pa yongs su 'dzi// de ni dges
266a7(rgyud): kyogs napas dang // mdon par co sa na rgya// thob dpod tan dang ma gru ni// kyad par can yang gyur du// byang chub 'bras pa'i bar du yang // de nyid tu zhes ba tug cas/ dem grom sogs pasnyed pa yis/ 
266a8(rgyud): nas nigs su gyur ba// dpog sang sngags rig sngags rnam pa/ 'i tshim med par 'grub par 'gyur// slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dem par bye ba'o// // de nas gsang sngags thos pa'o// bya ba'i cho ga la brtson pa/ de nga
266b1(rgyud): shAng 'thu ba'i// mtshan nyid gzhan yang bag par bya// gcang shing dul la brtan par ldan// ma 'a dus gro ldan gser bags// blam khams 'dzags pa shes gtan can// bzod ldan drang lag po ma med// nad med pa
266b2(rgyud): 'den par smra// 'pho zhing ba ka la dang labab// de bzhin yan lag mang ba'i// blo ldan das na 'grub par shes// dkon mchog gsum la gang dad cing // theg pa chen po la yang bsgom// dge ba'i phyogs la brtson 'grungs na//

266b6(rgyud): rdzang 'brung ba/ den rig sngags 'bras bu'i rjod// gang dag de dang nga bshad dang// rang bzhin kyang cing chag paspangs ya/ mi la man yang dngos grub pag/ de la yang ngas grub yod// 'gas gas mtshogapa da

267a1(rgyud): ba can// sems stobs che la rtsol phod pa// bden par sra zheng gus pa

271b2(rgyud): mthong na'ang mchod par ba' ba'i chos ni bshad pa dag/ bos nas dad pa bskyed par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mchog gi/ mthu la rab tu dga' bar bya// sngags kyi las rnams sna tshogs pa// bos nas yid ni bla

272b1(rgyud): shes par bya// da tshagal ba sdong pa dang // de bzhin khri shing sdum bu dag/ lbab lbub rnams dang sheng la dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ sa tha ba la shes pa yin// snam de bzhin gshegs rags la// ba ma pad

306a7(rgyud): br-ig gos kyang mastong // oM dz+wa la lo tsa ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga'o// oM ba lo kA na swA hA/ pad+ma'i rigs pa'o// oM ban+d+ha ner d+hi ba te swA hA/ de rje'i rigs la'o// 
306a8(rgyud): rigs gsum kyi mig sman bslu ba'i rig sngags so// ngas dang rgyab bsal pa'i phyir// spos kyi chun kyor gang tsam// dri zhim bdun bdun bzlas pa dag/ khyor ba nyid kyi
306b1(rgyud): btung bar bya// de nas nye reg byas nas ni// blo dang ldan pas mtshan ma brtag/ mtshan ma bzang po mthong nas ni// bsgrub pa gus par brtsam par bya// 'khor lo dung dang lcags kyu
306b2(rgyud): / gzung drung pad ma rgyal mtshan dang // bkra shrIs bum pa gang ba dang // dpal ba'i rdo rje phreng ba dang // bla mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // sgyu ma ma'am byeng na bu thogs par// ni chung ngaste/ 
306b3(rgyud): ngachagras pa dag/ gang zhig de yis 'grub par ston// bram ze gos dkar gyon pa dang // sa na glang po ca dag dang // rtswa rngog 'bras bu sa tshogasu dang // ngo mtshar che zhing mthong ba dag
306b4(rgyud): 'brug ke sma ni skrags pa dang // rig byed dbyings dang rgyal ba'i sgra// dung dang rdza dang rdza rnga yi// sgra rnams chub phyir rab tu shis// rma bye khrung khring dang mo dang // ne tsho la sogs bya rnams kyi// 
306b5(rgyud): narams ni kun thos nas// dngos grub sbyin pa'i las brtsam mo// smon lam bkra shis thams cad dang // bsod nams dga' dang bde legs tshig/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rnams/ 
306b6(rgyud): nas 'grub pa shes par bya// glog dang sprin dang char 'bab dang // ser bu me tog char 'bab dang // 'ja' dang dri ni zhim po ste// mtshan ma 'di dag lha yi pon// bar snang las byung
306b7(rgyud): tshan mni// thams cad 'bring por shes par bya// sa las byung ba'i mtshan ma dag/ de dgas pa'i yin par bshad// lha dag gis ni dngos grub rab// bar snang dag gi 'bring por 'gyur
306b8(rgyud): sapa dag gi dngos grub pa la// gsum la'ang gsum gsum dag tu dbye// de dag la sogs mtshan ma rnams// dngos grub phyir ni rab tu bsgrags// mdor na gsang sngags tha
307a1(rgyud): / la// de las bzlog pas myi 'grub po// dang por mtshan ma bzung nas ni// sems kyang rab tu dga' byas te// yongs su mgu ba'i bsam pa yis// de nas bsgrub pa brtsam
307a2(rgyud): par bya// sgrub pa'i mtshan ma rim pa phye ba'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyud kun dang // yang na bsgrub pa dag la'ang dang // chos grangs srung tsam byed pa dang // mtshan ma 'di rgyas par sa
307a3(rgyud): sa nas// mi bzung bya la mar dag gi/ rigs kyi rig pas sbyin sreg bya// de nas las rnams brtsam byas nas// 'on tam dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gnas gang dag tu rim pa bzhin
307a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang ni mngon bri zhing // de nyid du ni sgrub pa yi// de yi rim po bshad pa yin// ri la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su// dngos grub chen po thob par bsgrags// mtshol sogs par

312b4(rgyud): ba'i phyir// bdug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan// cho ga 'di yis rdzas dag la// bdugs nas de la dbang yang bskur// dbang bskur nas ni lha gnas su// bzhag ste legs par mchid pa bya// des
312b5(rgyud): cig las gsungs pa// thos par bya phyir gtor ma bsog/ bdag nyid rgyas par khrus byas nas// cho ga 'don lajam par bya// dri zhim rnams kyis dril byas nas// de bzhin khrus kyi kya
312b6(rgyud): m+b+ha ma byed mtshams nas// khas pas rdzas la yongs su bzlas// srung pa ga blu gos rnams dang // thal ba srungs kAr chu dag le// bsrung ba byor ni s+ya 'di lnga// gsang sngas
312b7(rgyud): bzlas pa brtsam par bya// de dag thog mar bzlas brjod de// cho ga 'di ni myur du bya// da byer de tshe dgos pa kun// thog ma nyid du bsngags par bya// me tog la sogs ci 'byor pa// dngas
312b8(rgyud): 'asdub byas nas ni// ci rigs pa mi gnas bzhag ste// sru ba pi'asar ni gnas par bya// dkyil 'khor mas gsung mcho ga yis// ma khasapas dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang // tshi rigs pa

313a2(rgyud): rnams lnga bre bar bya// mkhas pas thab sbyor buM zlas pa yis// sgo drung gi ni bum pa la// slad bu lhod par gtags nas su// de nas der ni bzhag par bya// thab sbyor ba gegs
313a3(rgyud): sel byed pa'i// khro bo li t+pa la bAn bzhin du// srid pa'i 'og nas 'byung ba dang // 'jug par bya ba'ang gsungs so// yang na mkhas pas khro bo des// srad phul nA sngags pa'am// ba
313a4(rgyud): na du gang dga' ba'i// rig sngags gzhan gyis bzlas kyang rung // bskrad pa la sogs cho ga dag/ sngar gsungs pa yang shes bya zhing // dkyil 'khor gyis ni nye 'khor du// chog
313a5(rgyud): de dag bye bar gsungs// phyogs dang phyogs skyong ci snyed dang // so so'i rigs kyi lha yi rnams// phyogs dang gau rim ci lta bar// de kun phyi rol dag tu mchod// bum par rdo

319a6(rgyud): dpar gsungs// mchog tu khro ba la gnas te// mngal dung khrod thal ba yis// gru/ gum rub tu sgo btong ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bre bar bya// de ltar bris nas phyi rol bskor// 
319a7(rgyud): rerig sngags bzhag par bya// de nas shAr+yA bcom ldan 'das// legs par grub byed ces bya ba// drag po gnod sbyin sde dpon ni// mthu chen+da risha kas rgyal po dang // rdo khrod
319a8(rgyud): // de ma rgya sa bya ma// da ky-i gas byed pa chums/  nga canan /  da kyi mi me nga // de nid na dang / 'byed dag nga
319b1(rgyud): dbyung bar da pa//  bo chen po grags pa rnams// de dag ris bzhin bsto nas rba// sakhas pas mchod nga phyog pa shen//  tog ma pa phyogs pa yachod// gtor ma thug dang byatsas par gsus

321a1(rgyud): las// ma lus pas ni sbyin sreg bya// gang tshe rdzas ni sbyin gyur tam// yang na sbyin pa gzhan yang rung // sgrub pa po la 'chags byed na// de tshe mkhas pas zhi bar bya// gal te rgyud ni

321a3(rgyud): ga las mapar kya bcu'o// mkhal pas rigs gsus ngag gyis pa / grogs 'thang de kun pa byed// dkyil la 'o gi cog pa ni// gsang sngags 'di ni rjod na/

325b1(rgyud): ma 'a rgyaganang rdul 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi skyabs byed du
325b2(rgyud): 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa bsrub pa'i sgom pagrangs pa/ byang chub tu sems paskyed pa/ seng de'i bdag nyid can+da/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad mnyes par byed 'dod pa/ byang chub
325b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i spyong nga'i tshogs nye bar sog bar 'dod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes par tu thob par 'dzad pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung sa dang / rnam pa
325b4(rgyud): thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa/ nam mkha' mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin chen nyid thob par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
325b5(rgyud): sa bcul rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje 'ching rnams bdag lang gangs su gsol/ bdag byang chub tu sems ba skyed pa/ lam la rab tu gnas pa ming 'den
325b6(rgyud): kyi baM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dus thams cad du yong ye 'bram no tshon/ de bzhin no shegs pa mnga' chen po can rnams da
325b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chen po brnyes pa rnams kyis bzhi shing bdag la rtag tu bsod nams kyi stobs chen po dang / ye shes kyis nye bar brtan pa dang / brjod
325b8(rgyud): 'grus dang / brtson pa'i bdag nyid dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ 
326a1(rgyud): de'i 'og tu yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag med 'di zhes bgyi la 'khor bar lhung ba/ 'ching
326a2(rgyud): pas bcings pa/ brtson rang tu dang/ chos kyi lam snang ba/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra bde bas mngon par gtsas pa/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ skyob pa ma mchis pa/ gnas
326a3(rgyud): ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/ ston pa ma mchis pa/ lam gol bar zhugs pa/ 'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa/ ngan song la gzhol ba
326a4(rgyud): ngan song la 'bab pa/ ngan songal babag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs par spang ba/ dge ba'i bshas gnyen dang bral ba/ sman pa la ma sman pa dang / 'thun pa la mi mthun pa dang
326a5(rgyud): dge ba la mi dge bar bzung ba/ slob da'onam mchis pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lta ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
326a6(rgyud): kyis 'tshe las gtses pa/ bde ba ma thob pa/ mi skrag pa ma tho bag me 'jigs pam thob pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma bzhag pa/ zhi pa dang / dul bdang / sbyin pa dang / nges pa dang / yang dag par
326a7(rgyud): pa dang / bag yod pa dang bral ba/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / sna dang / 'bod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byen pa rnams la gnas pa dang bral po/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dka' 'ang
326a8(rgyud): btang snyoms pa gnas pa dang dral ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rnam gsus la rgyab kyi phyogs pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes chen po dang dra ba ba/ shin tu gnas pa'i chos
326b1(rgyud): tu 'byung ba'i na tid la mi gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa dang bral ba/ stobs rnams ma thob ga me 'jigs pa dang mi ldan cing mi gnas pa/ mi brjod pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i skabs dang mi ldan pa/ yon tan gyis stong pa/ 
326b2(rgyud): skyen gang rtson gyi mgasas la me ga ca tho sa gsas da [।]
326b3(rgyud): ga tu rmongs pa/ rtag tu mnyam par sa 'anag pa/ rtag nyon mos pa'i rjes su zhugs pa lag zugs rje chen pos dgongs te bdag gi skyabs mdzad
326b4(rgyud): nga chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs byar mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / me 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
326b5(rgyud): 'drel pa bco brgyang dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par stsol ba dang / gzungs rnapas byab mang du gsol/ bdag gi can dum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
326b6(rgyud): dzang du gsol/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / mthu chen po brnyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag
326b7(rgyud): gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang / bkur ste chen po bgyis nas bdag 'bral lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkod pa chen po rnams kun tu
326b8(rgyud): lnga tshogs kyi rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnams dang rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams dang / rin 'i kye ri rnams dang / rin po che'i gdan rnams dang / rin mo ci'i phan ga rnams sa/ 
327a1(rgyud): rin po che'i phreng ba rnams dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan rnams dang / rin po che'i chun po rnams dang / rin po che'i mu tig gi dra ba rnams dang / 
327a2(rgyud): dri ci'i spyod rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rnams dang / rin po che 'byur ba'i tshogs rnabs dang rin po che'i phre dang rgya nga/ nor bu cher po rnams dang / mar me'i sdong zhug tsang la nong bu dang / 
327a3(rgyud): / rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pas 'tsher ba gser gyi gtsong gcong mang pos btags pa rnams dang / pad ma 'dzam bra chu bo'i gser gyi ges chen po can rnams dang / gser gyi phreng ba rnams
327a4(rgyud): gser gyi gizhal med khang rnams dang / rin po che'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i changar rnams dang / rin po che'i seng po can gyi khang bzangs rtseg pa nor tha ba mchog sna tshogs kyisahA
327a5(rgyud): na po che'i lan kan can rnams dang / reg sngags pa chen po'i skyed mos rgyal rnams dga' ba rnams des gnas nyams dga' ba rnams dang / gzhas med yang rnams dga' ba rnams dpa
327a6(rgyud): rol tshal nyams dga' ba rnams dang / lha'i nya'ang spyad pa nyams dga' ba yongs su ma spyad 'ji snyed ma ches pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
327a7(rgyud): dag 'dzam bu'i gling na mchis pa'i sman rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang / bcud kyis len gyi rigs rnams dang / gang dag dus thams cad pa'i nor bu dang / gang dgazhal lam pozhim po phran
327a8(rgyud): ri shing rnams dang / tsan dan gyi ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / tsan dan dmang po rnams dang / 
327b1(rgyud): tog dang ldan pa'i nags tshal chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngang rgyas pa med du mchi ba'i dri gda' ba'i ljon shing gi rigs rnams dang / gang dag dpag bsam gyi shing bdag gi ma mchis shing phongs su
327b2(rgyud): dz+nyAn pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag rgya mtsho'i nor du rnam pa sna tshogs dang / snying bzhin gyi nor bu rnams dang / gang dag de lhun po dang / ti se dang / spos kyi ngang ljang dang / ma la la dang
327b3(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang / man dA ra dang / rdo rje'i r-i la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi zom rnams la/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi phug rnams dang / rin
327b4(rgyud): che mA tshogs kyi brag rnams dang / dran po che sna tshogs kyis gzhi brtan pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rnams dang / rin po che sna chags kyi phung po rnams dang / rin
327b5(rgyud): tshogs kyi tham pas rnams dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi ka ba rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa'i tshur rnams dang / nor zla bai d+har+ya sde tshogs kyi sgron ma rnams dang / gdung
327b6(rgyud): lha yul gyi gzhal med khang na blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lnga yul gyi lha'i grong khyer gyi gzhal myed khang yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag lha phul gyi me to// 
327b7(rgyud): bstan sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag rtsa yul gyi glu dbyangs kyi cha spyad rnams dang / gzhal med khang stong pa rnams kyi char rlung gis bskyod pa na sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / rol mo
327b8(rgyud): spyad kyi rnam pa ma dkrol bar dang sgra snyan par 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul kyi bya'i tshogs gzhal med pang stong pa rnams ni gnas shing skad snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / 
328a1(rgyud): gang dag rin po che'i sprin sgra dbyangs chen po snyan par 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha'i nor bu rnams dang / gang dag klu dbyangs rnams dang / gang dag dri gang 'a ba'i
328a2(rgyud): zhe rdzun ge rams dang / nga 'i sngon shi dmas dang / rlos kyi sno nyi na sa dang/  shing rnams dang bad gleng rnam sa dang / chen che'i ldan
328a3(rgyud): sulongs ma spyad pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la 'bul lo// gang dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i 'jig rten e khA mA sa thams
328a4(rgyud): rame tog gi sprin rnams dang / dri'i sprin rnams dang / phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / bdug pa'i sprin rnams dang / lhab lhub kyi sprin rnams dang / byug pa'i sprin rnams
328a5(rgyud): mi ga shes kyi spyan rnam pa dang/ na po rgyal sbyin nga/ rin 'i bdun kyi sbyin rnama'i dang / rkyen po che'i sa kyi nam yang po ri
328a6(rgyud): skyed rnam sa dang / rin po chas bkang ba'i sno gi sbyin rnam sa dpa tshe nor zla chen po snangs pa'i sbyin rnams dang rin po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi smin rnams dang / mar me
328a7(rgyud): jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam la dri zhim bye'i 'bru mar gyis yongs su bka' dang snying pa'i ras 'i rab birma tsam rab tu 'bang ba rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad thams
328a8(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la 'phrul lo// de dag thams cad la gsol pa ni byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa
328b1(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa de dag rnams la sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa mang por bzhugs par gsol lo// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
328b2(rgyud): rams kyis mi dmigs par bzhugs te bsngos pa ltar bdag gi bsod nams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
328b3(rgyud): da dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nam sA la rjes su yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad kyang so sor bshags so// oM smar smar/ bi mA nAHdmahA
328b4(rgyud): // de 'og tu ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen po'i sprin rnams
328b5(rgyud): la la zhig sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed dpes yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'di nyin byar ram/ mtshan mo 'din na/ de'i sdig pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing nyon mongs
328b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang bsrabs par 'gyur ro// gong du smos pa'i yon tan rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas brjod par byas na tshangs pa brgya'i bstod nams 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
328b7(rgyud): tshilas na gang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags rnams kyang yang dag par grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang gis rengs su bzung bar yang
328b8(rgyud): nga// je ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan
329a1(rgyud): las do bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / 'che'i mkhan po d+ha thA kar dang / lo rlab ban de dpal 'byor gyis bkra
329a2(rgyud): rgya gang kyi ma khan po byedra kar thatha dang /  chen gyi lo ts+tsha 'a byan de dpal brtsegs kyis bskur cing thus te gtan la 'byub/ shu la dag// rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya ma hA ba ri rnam na
329a3(rgyud): sa man tra ka bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po chen po sngags de de bcas pa/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
329a4(rgyud): / 'tshal lo// yon tan rgya mamyong dpag med pa// sangs rgya sa ma chos 'phags pa yi// dge 'dun dus gsum bzhugs pa rnams// ma lus pa la skyabs su mchi/ mi dge thams cad/ 
329a5(rgyud): bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i dgel rje 'i rang // chos kyi 'khor lo ba bskor dang // rdzogs ngas rgyas la pasprul ma la// kun mkhyen spyan gyis gzigs pa yi// bdag dag
329a6(rgyud): drung ngu gang mchis pa// des ni gtan du bral ba dag/ thams cad nye bar zhi gyur cing // rnam pa kun mchog ldan po yi// stong pa shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub ba
329a7(rgyud): rtag tu bde dang ldan par sheg/ rnam par mi tog ldan gyis grub// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // zla nyin du rol mo lhur// sems can don la 'jug par shog/ ji ltar
329a8(rgyud): rnams// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs bsngo// de ltar bdag gis dkar po rnams// byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi// dkon mchog gsum la dmigs pa yi// bdag
329b1(rgyud): maud dag /  lam ma maud na rdzas/ ma saSh+Ta //  kun khyes bdag nyid de// sangs bya spyo nga ldan pa dang // 'ag tan

329b4(rgyud): dpag med// rtag tu ston pa mdzad gyur cing // sa thucu thob nas de dag gi/ rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yis// byang chub dam pa thob par shog/ sangs rgyas cung
329b5(rgyud): nyid thob nas// bag chags bcas pa nyis bsags rtsa nas bto// ye shes skyeb med snying rje ldan nas su// 'gro ba rnams la sprin dang bde ba bgyi// phyogs bcumaH
329b6(rgyud): ya.A ba mthe bya'i don ma lus par k+Sha b+hA pa'i blo mang ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sna mtsho snyed la phyan 'tshal lo// sems
329b7(rgyud): pa yid gnyis zas la nas dang por shA kya'i rgyal po thub lo spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba 'od dpag med// bla ma lnga yang dga' dang gus pas
329b8(rgyud): rab kyi// gang zhig phyogs kun dag na da ltar byung ba 'i 'grol byams pa'i sangs rgyas nges par bzhugs rnams dang // 'das dang phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad la / khang/ 
330a1(rgyud): dgar ba'i yid kyis yang dag mchod pa bkye/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla smon pa dang / sku mchog gser 'od dang / bden pa'i dbyangs dang / 
330a2(rgyud): lhun po bzang po dang / lhun po chen po dang / dbang po'i 'byung gnas dang / pad ma'i dbyangs dang phyag bzang dang / nga kyi tog dang mchog ge 'byung gnas dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / dpa' bo'i rdza
330a3(rgyud): dang / kun nas snang ba dang / rnam dag zhal dang / rin chen tig dang / mdog bzang 'byung gnas dang / sa la ri rgyal po dang / rnam dag 'od dang / bde mdzad rgyal po dang / kun nas snang ba dang / ldan
330a4(rgyud): babang thogs sa bying bu'od byed dkyi bar dab dgon mtshag thegs ba kun na pa 'ang dang dpapa rtseg pa dab bkod pa cheran po ba sbyangs gas pa bai dU r+ya dang / dbang po rgyal mtshan dang / rdo bya ba'i sde dang / rang
330a5(rgyud): / stan ne dang / bong mdzes dang / me tog tshems dang / spyan bzang dang / shid tu bzang po dang / 'od bzang sgron pa dang / dgongs pa rnam dag dang / chos kyi 'od zer dang / brtson 'gru che ldan
330a6(rgyud): pad ma'i snying po dang / lhag par dgongs pa bton pa dang / rdo rje'i sngo dang / legs par 'khrungs dang / tshul bzang dang / dbyangs snyan dang / yon tan dbul 'od dang / 'jig rten sa
330a7(rgyud): ngamadog bzang gsal ba dang / rtag tu brtson dang / tsan dan bla 'ad dang rgyas pa'i dpal dang / rgya mtsho dang / dbang po chen po dang / rgyal bya'i dbang po dang 'od bkod pa dang / rtson 'grus// 
330a8(rgyud): ngas pa dang / kun du ston pa dang / gsung ba chen po dang / rdo rje sa sa rab tu 'joms pa dang / drang srings dang ma'i 'ang dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / nam 'joms dang / tan chen pong // 
330b1(rgyud): shin du mthor gshegs rang phan par bzhed dang / drang srong chen po dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang 'od srung dang / gser mdog dang / gzi brjid mchog dang / mtho ba dang / 
330b2(rgyud): 'gra gas dang / rkyen chen grags pa dang / gtsu rji 'od dang / rnam par snang mdza dra dang / don yid gzigs dang / dbang pa'i tog dang grags pa dang / sdang mad da dang / be nu bo gros dang / skar hA
330b3(rgyud): dang skag dang / 'od 'dang dang / rin chen mchod spong dang / 'bar ba'i tog dang thugs gzungs dang rab zhi dbang
330b4(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / kun du zhal dang / mA spang ba dang / bdud 'joms dang / sgo'i rgyal po dang / legs pon dang / gzi brjid bzang po dang tshogs kyi dbying po dang / shin du rnam par dgano
330b5(rgyud): ba gshegs pa dang / bsam las 'di dang / zla ba'i rgyal po dang / bde ba che thob dang / snang bar gyur pa dang / rgya mtsho chen 'od nga mi 'khrugs pa dang / dbang po'i mchog dang me tog tog dang / 
330b6(rgyud): dpon chen po dang / rnam par rgyas byed dang / ma tig bzang po dang/ bzhes gnyen pa zang po dang / rgyu gar bzang po dang / nyi mi'i bring po dang / tshogs kyi dpal dang / nor bye dpa pa dang / sdang ba ba
330b7(rgyud): dang / 'od dpag med dang / dpal chen po dang / stobs mchog dang / smon maste/ de dag la sogs bsten blang ba dang / khyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba gang dag yon tan gyi klung dpag tu me byar gyur pa/ 'khor
330b8(rgyud): po'i 'dab rdza ba las/ yang dag par nal ba/ gtong ba dang ldan zhing tshul khrims rnam par dag la bzod pa chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus skyengs shing snying po gso ba sem pa
331a1(rgyud): pa'i bsam gtan chen po dang ldan pa/ mkhyen rang rlob thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa sems can la thugs rje dang tshogs dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi thugs skye ba rab tu 'byung ba/ 
331a2(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ don la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi snying po/ skye dbu la byams pa/ g.yo me mnga' ba/ dga'ar ba mi mnga' ba/ chags pa mi mnga' ba/ byams pa'i thugs
331a3(rgyud): bdag nyid can/ lha'i yang lha dang / mi'i mchog gis rjed pa/ lha'i lang lha ste/ rgyal ba de rnams la bdag gi lus dang ngag dang / sems gus pa rnams dums phyag 'tshal lo// rkyal ba de rnams/ 
331a4(rgyud): / kyis bdag sdig pa las rnam pa thams cad du bskyab tu gsol/ sdug bsngal du mas gdungs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang rab tu brtson pas drang du gasngol/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag
331a5(rgyud): kyang ngan 'gro dag las drang zhing de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur du gzhag tu gsol/ drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'i// dge ba bdag gis bsgrubs pa gang lags pa/ de yis
331a6(rgyud): 'dag ni tshe rabs thams cad tu/ thub dbang de dang lhan cig 'grogs par shog/ chos dang zang zing mchod pas bde bar gshegs/ de la nyon mongs med par bdag gis mchod// mchod pa bgyis
331a7(rgyud): shing lam gnyis la brten nas/ 'gro ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyar cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan thos pa dang / mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yongs su
331a8(rgyud): sprugs pas sgrib pa thams cad 'daper yung/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las ca thar bar 'gyur/ blan med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang nges par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyed
331b1(rgyud): kyis klas pa rnams pa'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs thams cad na dus gsum lhag ma med cing lus pa med pa ma lus pa'i 'das rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sbyar thugs
331b2(rgyud): chung ba dang / byang chub sa ya pa thams cad la phyag sa pas rgyas 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa'adi dag thams cad padan la dgongs sun pa

350b1(rgyud): du'abags pa/ skyon med ga ma 'dres pa/ rtog pa med pa/ lha dang mi dag mngon par dga' ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bsngags pa/ sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rab

356b6(rgyud): pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dkon pa chen po dang / ma dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang phyung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig
356b7(rgyud): rkyen pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sem
356b8(rgyud): gang dag 'jigatan 'di das parim tu 'chi'am ba'i ri na ma nye bar gnas pa na yang / 'phags sa thugs rje da pa byag khyod gas ma na su dur dzong ding nga bya phyid pa chen nga/ 
357a1(rgyud): par gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems tshad mad

357a3(rgyud): thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rab tu rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs//

357b1(rgyud): / khabs nad pamatshan nam yod cing stan brgyad pa seM par bya ga ji ltar dus gsum che rgyal bsras dang bcas pa thams cad kyis thugs rje'i rang bsen 'phags pa spyan pa ga / 
357b2(rgyud): bang phyu de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi
357b3(rgyud): 'bar 'byung bar gyur cig/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba 'in// de med bdag na lum skyes bya ba// de skyed mgon po mchod bkyed cig// de snyed mus sbyar tshogs bgyid shog/ ji sring bdag ni yor
357b4(rgyud): tsA/ skad bdag gis ngag skyes par// de srid mgon po mtshan brjod cing // ngag gi sbyong pa tshogs bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na// de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba// de snyed mgon po rje

358a3(rgyud): tshungs pa med// de bas 'di na rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar sho// zang ba chags bral bdud rtsa 'dus ma byas// shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu bya/

370b1(rgyud): sod ga nag/ gnas ni byed pa rnams pan byeng go// 'grol par byed co sam ni 'di gshegs te// tshangs pa la logs tshogs / 
370b2(rgyud): dril ba gdugs// sna chogs rdzogs pa yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shes des ni skyed ku dbam lazhi byed nga// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'am chog tu nyer gshegs pa// na dra nga ba'i me tog
370b3(rgyud): pos mngon mchod pa/ lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / 'akra shes de 'di skye dkun pas la de byed do// spa dbang klu dang me yi dbang pos phyag byas pa// mkhal rdzing gnod kyi
370b4(rgyud): dbang pos bachod gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so bram bcu ldan pa'i bkra shes gang // 'akra shes rjes ni skye dku rnams la de byed sheg/ dkon mchog gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs
370b5(rgyud): bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar gyi mkhan po drin ma tri dang / zhu chen gyi lo rla ba pan de ye shes skyes// bsgyur cing zhus ta ga tan la phab pa/ yangs so// !la rgyad 'brum la gtugs// rgya gar skad du/ 
370b6(rgyud): dan tre sA s+t+rai kA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog ga sub kyi bkru shes kyi tshigs su bcang pa/ dkon mchog ga 'am la phyag 'tshal lo// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog thar med// chos rje nyi rtul ba'i byin
370b7(rgyud): 'dra bar kyis// bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgrazhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog blan med// dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa
370b8(rgyud): kyis/ nyes pa'i spyod bral dag / tshogs rnas 'phelal// rtag tu ba lagan sa nyin mtshan pakra zhe
371a1(rgyud): bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhis// drug tu dag gnas nyin mtshan bkra shes shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang spangs me'i byin parlab sa kyis// ngan mdzad lnga yi 'akra shis gnas gyur te/ 
371a2(rgyud): bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // tshe ri de nad med bde skyid ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum kyi bkra shes kyi tshigs su bcad ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsus
371a3(rgyud): ba rdzogs so// / rgya ga pa rtse mkhan po dzin me tra dang / lu chen kye lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/  // sdug 'du rgyad 'phrul la gtugs/ bsod nams chen
371a4(rgyud): dpal gyis phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba/ gtsug lag gnyis kyi mdzad pas/ bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs tog dang / 'gro ba mang po'i mgon skyabs dang / 
371a5(rgyud): kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs ma 'jig rten gyi bya ba la snying po med par gzigs nas/ rnam g.yeng kun spangs te ri khrod dben pa kho nar bslal gsum gyi khang pazang mang du thos pa'i tshe
371a6(rgyud): gcing / thug sa rje'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tog gis mdzes pa'i/ bdag cag rnams kyi 'dren pa dam pa/ dpal 'an tham bzang po'i mtshan can/ dge sbyong chen pod de thugs kyi dkos
371a7(rgyud): das man po napa nga yong lardzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'gyob gas pa'i gnas skabs dang / pan she pa bdes kyila'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan parin mom ldan dang na
371a8(rgyud): byongasakun dud cing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ bang khabs su smon lam gyi thobs ca dathapa ba ga sgra bca 'o// byang chub 'i sadang 'dams dang / los/ skyes mchog kyang pa par na / 
371b1(rgyud): ce la rten dag / ba bar gshegs pag nga so ba bar sa sub sgo stong kyim dang rnal pa gsung lun 'a dzin dang / rgyu phye zung poganasus po 'i rgyal yang la
371b2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sdes ston 'dang bstan pa la zhes nas me phyed pa'i dad pa brtan pos kun nas bgrang ste legs par gdangs pa rnams la khyad par du gdul bya dbang po rnon po dag tshogs rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs rang zhing sbrul dus
371b3(rgyud): bar bas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'thob par byed pa/ gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa gsal bar byed pa'i gzhung lugs tud 'bu ba zhes grags pa 'di rnams ni bla ma rje btsun chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyin
371b4(rgyud): nas dang / nab chen po chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi kar chag dang / 'a pe chen po rigs pa'i bab kris mang dunga'i rgyud kyi kar chag rgyud 'bum rgyad gyi me tog la sogs pa la brtan nas gdan sa chan
371b5(rgyud): dpalas skya'i rgyud 'bum dang / shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po gser sdings pas lus dag dang ge rim mdzad nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyer skye med ston shes bgengs pa'i rgyud 'bum dang / dpal thar
371b6(rgyud): 'anag sa// maung gi dge bshesa'ang dbyar gyis bzhengs pa'i rgyud 'phrum dang / tha thA Ta ldang rtsa pa'i phyag dpe dang / 'od dga' thun gsus kyi gtsug lag gi rgyan 'bum la sogs rgya
371b7(rgyud): dag pa grangs yang deng gar ma legs la dka' rnabs la dpe phyi byas te/ mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal sdang thang du lung rigs kya dbang phyug shAkya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyings kyis legs par bzhe
371b8(rgyud): 'i 'akas 'thar gyi mor gdan drangs nas me dbang pothog gan theng zur rtse rib gti kun dgang rgyal mtshan pa la bzang po bstan ci byang 'dug/ rgyal ba'i bstan lngabaca dun pa'i mtha ge ba
372a1(rgyud): / 'gro ba'i byam ston pa gdul bya'i ngo zhi bar gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas lo lum spong banye brgya brgyad du 'das pa/ ma mo pagazhi logs kyi zla ba cos grangs gapa skar b.rang po yang / 
372a2(rgyud): btsugs te/ rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'angon pa byang chub dpal ldan gyis sa sa ti'i ri'apa rnams dang / rgya'i dngos po b.rang zhing bang la khan ma thob med pas 'thun pa'i rkyen bsgrubs ras// bstan par
372a3(rgyud): nga gnas dpa pa na len tra dang mtshungs bsngal pa'i rgyal po sa chen gan gyi dgos kyi lha khang dpal gung thang gi gtsag lag khang chen por legs par bzhengs te/ sde snod kyi tshul la cung zad po/ 
372a4(rgyud): sa bzang po che ba'i btsun pa kun dga' 'bum gyis kha ta dang / zhus dag gi dang pobagyis shing / gzhan yang dad pa dang brtson 'grus che zhing blo gros gsal ba'i sdom brtson dam pa mang
372a5(rgyud): thos shing skye sdong 'dzin pargyams kyis rgya gar skadang la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i skang sor bzhag rnam sani sngon gyi po tsA ba chen po rnams kyis mdzad pa bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po dang
372a6(rgyud): spyod pamapo gnyis pa la sogs pa la btad nas dag par byas shing / bod skad rnams ni yul skad dang / 'phral skang ngan pa rnams dang / ma 'drem par 'od yul gyi sngon gyi bajam
372a7(rgyud): b.rin po rnam pa dang / sgyur byed dmapa la phyir byon pa rnams bdagasang na dag skad gapar bcad la sogs rjes su 'brings nas drag dang / ma mya dang / sa p+na zhes
372a8(rgyud): yod med rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis de sa ba dpal gsulas byed dpe bya rnams dang gtugs te/ badz+ra don pa nor bar dag par byas nas/ gzhi dung gis ka di ltar dkar zhing
372b1(rgyud): sa stsa ni/  de yi pa par ga yong tud du bri sa zhing/  gi rgyud ben rdzog
372b2(rgyud): dadu byis pa rnams kyang phye napa/ rgyud kyi nang du bris te/ 'dir ni rgyang sde bzhi po so sor phyen sa rang rang gi gsung chad che chung dang bcod bya 'thun pa dang / mtshan 'thun pa dang / the tshan 'thun
372b3(rgyud): ma rjebs te/ grong me dang zhir ma tshang la ma nor bar rgya ba zung zhing bkod pa legs par byasam pa yin no//  nam sa dpa la rdzas ra tho ba/ chos kyi rgyam pod maldan rgya gyi
372b4(rgyud): bcog ke gros mi tshungs 'amed pa deg/ dpal ldan thas dag stso chen po dang/ thugs dayongs bya ma rdzogs par byaphyi gtan pa rdes phyir 'de bang gshegs pa'i gsu/ sapa'i mthod de 'i snyed gyung po/ 
372b5(rgyud): legs par bzhengs par gyur pa de dag la' 'di dag de rje theg pag pas byed pa/ bstan pa'i ning po rgyad 'brub zhes bya'o// kur dab 'du lhag pa medapa pa'i mazu ka gzung mab rin chen tshu bzhin pa des pa la
372b6(rgyud): dge ba stong ka'i bu 'od dang / mkha' ltar dag cing yangs 'gang thob das/ 'gro kun pa nas de'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba yi/ bstan pa min chen phyogs dus kun khyab cing / khre 'dzin spyod dang spang ba'i dam pa rnams/ sbeng
373a1(rgyud): / rgyu byed pa su ba nga nga / man mkhyod la byas byed 'dadan kyang /  mi dang kyi lda ga skyen
